programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps Amanda and Adam Cropper find a new home in the Thai province of Phuket, which they intend to use as a holiday home before they eventually move there permanently.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps Gary and Susie, who want to start a new adventure in Florida's beautiful Sarasota Keys. For their budget of £220,000 they're after a place to escape the British winters, as close to the amazing beaches of the Gulf of Mexico as possible. Jonnie shows them how far their budget will stretch in this highly desirable corner of the US.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Pickwick boss Nathan considers a deal on a diamond tennis bracelet, while Dan and Ellie at London Road make offers on a vintage trumpet, a mechanical digger and a gold pocket watch.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Charlie and Patrick at Nikolas Patrick value 19 pictures by American artist Darell Koons, and hit the road to look at an unusual antique chandelier and a vintage pinball machine.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At Nikolas Patrick Pawnbrokers in Kent, brothers Charlie and Patrick consider a £30,000 designer dress and a pair of unusual clocks. Nathan examines a retro jukebox in London.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: A guitar signed by David Bowie turns up in Sheffield, while potential deals in Kent include a pair of vintage Austin Seven cars and an unopened bottle of champagne from 1952.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to the coastal community of Long Beach, California, to save an Italian restaurant that was opened in 1958 and now under the misguided leadership of Nino, who blamed by brother Michael and sister Carina for the eatery's failings. Their 78-year-old mother Inge desperate for Nino to turn the business around, but the feuding family members will have to solve their differences first.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to Babylon in New York, where the peace of Long Island is regularly shattered by the volatile Pellegrino family, proprietors of Peter's Italian Restaurant. Gordon finds owner Tina's work to save the eatery from oblivion is frequently ruined by the behaviour of her brother, a tyrannical front-of-house manager whose violent temper constantly undermines staff morale.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay continues his travels across America saving failing restaurants from disaster. In the first of two visits to Mill Street Bistro in Norwalk, Ohio, the chef encounters Joe Nagy, who claims he has the best menu from New York to Los Angeles. However, his servers and diners tell a different story, and his resistance to change leads to some explosive confrontations.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the concluding part of his trip to the Mill Street Bistro in Norwalk, Ohio, Gordon's disagreement with proprietor Joe Nagy erupts into one of his most intense confrontations yet. Just when it looks like he has turned the corner and is ready to accept help, Joe slips back into his old ways, denying his own failings and picking petty fights. Can Gordon get this stubborn owner to finally accept his advice and secure the future of his restaurant?.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Yanni's in Seattle, where he clashes with defiant owner Peter Avgoustiou, a chef so set in his ways that he hasn't allowed any changes to his menu since the Greek restaurant opened in 1984. Peter's family is concerned the business is becoming trapped in the past, and standards are slipping, but he seems determined to stick to his guns.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: The odds are stacked against Noel Fitzpatrick and his team as a golden retriever puppy with horrific facial injuries is brought into the practice after being attacked by another dog. Plus, a man drives all the way from Switzerland in the hope of a successful treatment for a Chihuahua, and a woman brings in her Hungarian vizsla, which has a bone and cartilage disorder.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words-and-numbers quiz, with Jon Richardson and Phil Wang who take on guest captain Russell Howard and Roisin Conaty. Nick Helm joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: Gogglesprogs
programme.desc: Young TV viewers give their honest, inimitable and ultimately hilarious take on the fall-out from the General Election, Come Dine with Me and the classic Robin Williams film Mrs Doubtfire.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Astronaut-in-training Nicky hopes to find romance with well-travelled motoring journalist Daniel. The restaurant also welcomes road sweeper Bruce, whose date is mother of two Yvonne. After years of being single, she's ready to put herself first and to find that one true love to keep her company into her twilight years.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old Lewis is rushed into the hospital after coming off his motorbike and colliding with two cars. He is immediately taken for a full body CT scan as doctors are concerned about the extent of the injuries to his pelvis, arm and head. Meanwhile, 27-year-old Sam awaits X-ray results after he fainted and cut his lip while smoking a Cuban cigar at a barbecue.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 79-year-old woman is airlifted to hospital after being involved in a road traffic collision, with consultants concerned that she may have life-threatening internal bleeding. Meanwhile, 80-year-old Mohammad has come to A&E after falling at home during a family Eid celebratory feast, and 56-year-old Russ is brought in after falling from a ladder while cutting back some trees at work.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: An extended edition, inspired by and in memory of MP Jo Cox, in which hosts Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker celebrate what the nation's people have in common a year on since her murder. Guests include Nick Clegg, Jon Richardson, Stephen Mangan, Elbow, Lily Cole and James Buckley. Plus, political rivals Tony Blair and William Hague, Nicola Sturgeon and Ruth Davidson, and Michael Gove and Ed Balls take part in comedy sketches.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef tries to reverse the fortunes of a diner in Bellmore, New York, where a talented cook's work is being undone by the manager's marketing plans - putting the finances in dire straits.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: With their children now leading independent lives, Kevin and Monique Dixon want to buy a holiday home on Florida's Gulf Coast, where they can enjoy the sailing and outdoor life as the UK winters begin back home. With £285,000 to spend, presenter Ben Hillman shows them five waterside homes.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps Tim and Irene Foster find a property on the Cape Peninsula with a budget of £240,000. Irene comes from Cape Town and dreams of seeing her family more often.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: With their children now leading independent lives, Kevin and Monique Dixon want to buy a holiday home on Florida's Gulf Coast, where they can enjoy the sailing and outdoor life as the UK winters begin back home. With £285,000 to spend, presenter Ben Hillman shows them five waterside homes.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Kendal and Andy Strong first visited Lanzarote 10 years ago and a recent trip back and a particularly beautiful sunset re-ignited their love for the island. Now the pair are determined to buy their very own holiday home, so armed with a budget of £75,000, Jonnie Irwin shows them five potential properties, including some away from their favourite spot of Playa Blanca.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: A few years ago, Marie Ash had a holiday romance on Fuerteventura. It didn't last, but her love for the island did. Now Marie has decided the island would be the perfect place for her and her eight-year-old son to spend quality time together in the school holidays. Scarlette Douglas shows Marie - and her best friend Helen - how far her £90,000 budget will go.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer revisits two couples he helped look for their perfect properties. Rebecca and Joe from Warwickshire needed a family home with space for their three racing camels, and did not want to move too far from their friends and good schools. In Essex, Steve and Dee had £1million to spend, but a long list of requirements, including a swimming pool and a squirrel-shaped hedge.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help more people trying to buy a home, beginning in west London. Newlyweds Keon and Zoe are looking for a family house in Shepherd's Bush with space for their hobby of salsa dancing, but even with a budget of £450,000 this will be a challenge for Phil. Kirstie is scouting for properties in the borough of Richmond for Carolyn and Paul - a native of Sheffield who is struggling to get his head around London's inflated prices.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef tries to reverse the fortunes of a diner in Bellmore, New York, where a talented cook's work is being undone by the manager's marketing plans - putting the finances in dire straits.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Sam's Mediterranean Kabob Room in Monrovia, California, and within minutes of his arrival, is caught in the crossfire of an argument between the owner, his wife and their children, all of whom are feeling the pressure of working seven days a week. Can the chef save the business and mend the warring family's frayed relationships?.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Ackley Bridge
programme.desc: Jordan finds himself in charge of a baby that he has to sneak into school, but it is harder to conceal than he first anticipated, so blackmails PE teacher Steve into helping him out. Unable to return it to its mother, a stumped Steve ends up taking Jordan and the baby back to his house. Meanwhile, Missy agrees that if Cory sleeps with Nas, she will sleep with Cory. However, she soon discovers Cory has a loose tongue and that the whole school now thinks this is an open opportunity.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: A distressed woman arrives at Luton police station, where officers from Bedfordshire Police's Safeguarding Unit reveal to her that her 76-year-old husband is under arrest and in custody following allegations of historical child sex abuse dating back to the 1970s. Cameras follow every twist and turn of the process as detectives investigate the veracity of the allegations to find out if they there is enough evidence to build a case.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay tries to get in shape for a marathon but Michael thinks he can do it without training. Meanwhile, Tony asks Claire to dress down in an effort to lessen her allure. American comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Claire throws a party while Michael and Jay are out - but someone spikes the punch, prompting a drunken Tony to fulfil a lifelong fantasy and streak down the street. American sitcom starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: The housemates gather on the sofas once more as Emma Willis hosts the latest eviction, revealing which of this week's nominees the public have voted out, then chatting to them about their time on the show, who they think voted for them and why they feel it was their time to go. But before that, there's the question of seeing how they've all been getting on in the regular round-up.(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: A Wall Street banker is magically given the opportunity to find out what his life would have held if he had not walked out on his loving girlfriend. Suddenly transplanted into an alternative reality, complete with cosy home and kids, he is not initially impressed with the change - but his cold exterior gradually begins to thaw. Drama, starring Nicolas Cage, Tea Leoni and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Puppies Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Clip show featuring entertaining pups, including Oakley, the miniature Australian sheepdog puppy whose version of Frozen song `Let It Go' has entertained millions of viewers. There's also a miserable-looking canine called Grumpy Puppy, and the cheetah and puppy who saved one another's lives. Narrated by Ian Lee, with Zoe Lyons and Hal Cruttenden.(n)

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.(n)

Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.(n)

Thriller based on a short story by Stephen King, starring Maria Bello, Olympia Dukakis and Joan Jett.(n)

programme.title: Countdown to Murder
programme.sub-title: The Body in the Lake: Countdown to Murder.
programme.desc: The documentary examining some of Britain's most notorious murders charts the events surrounding the killing of Carol Park, whose body was discovered by amateur divers in Coniston Water in 1997 - more than 20 years after she went missing. When the body was identified, her husband Gordon was arrested on suspicion of murder, but the case was dropped on the basis of insufficient evidence in January 1998 and it was another eight years until he was tried and found guilty of Carol's murder and sentenced to life imprisonment.(n)

programme.title: Death by Selfie
programme.desc: Will Best explores how people's obsession with taking selfies is affecting their physical and psychological wellbeing. They include the urban explorers scaling tower blocks with no safety equipment in their bid to take the most extreme self-portraits, the make-up artist who has had more than 60 cosmetic procedures to ensure he always has a `selfie-ready' face and the man whose addiction to his cameraphone led to a suicide attempt.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: Sonia celebrates her freedom with Don Kaplan, but it soon becomes apparent that she is working to her own agenda. Unfortunately for her, so is the homicide detective.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Rory faces embarrassment in the showers on his first day at high school. Bridget interferes in Kerry's personal affairs and Principal Gibb offers Cate a job as a school nurse. Comedy, starring Katey Sagal and Amy Davidson.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: The girls grow suspicious of their mother's change of image - especially as she has also bought a new bed. Meanwhile, Kerry is unsure what to do about her current boyfriend. Comedy, starring Katey Sagal and Amy Davidson.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Kerry's secret is accidentally broadcast to the whole school, and both she and Bridget question Cate's motives for taking the job as school nurse - but Rory is pleased that she will be on hand to rescue him from a bully.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael agrees to sit in on keyboards with old friend and former bandmaster Johnny `Saxophone' Watson, only to find his musical skills have started to get a little rusty through disuse. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.sub-title: The Lady Is Not a Tramp.
programme.desc: Michael is aghast to find condoms in Claire's rucksack, and immediately jumps to the wrong conclusion. Damon Wayans stars.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay suspects there is a mouse in the house when she finds droppings and demands that Michael hire an exterminator.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael resorts to bribing his family in an effort to get time alone in the house, giving Claire money to go shopping and watch a video with Kady. However, a power cut soon jeopardises his chance for solitude. Starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay nominates Michael for the Small Businessman of the Year award and he assumes he is going to win it after his close friend on the board hints that it is a done deal.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jay and Michael return from a night out to find Junior and his new girlfriend Vanessa in a compromising position. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part two of two. After catching Junior and his girlfriend Vanessa getting up to no good, Michael and Jay throw him out of the house, and he ends up living in a tent in the back garden until everything has calmed down.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael is recruited for jury service and elected foreman, but tries to get the trial over quickly so he can rush home to watch a marathon showing of the Godfather films on TV. Unfortunately, he ends up having to rent the videos instead - and becomes convinced the Mafia are after him.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Junior and Claire find a wallet containing $500, and decide to keep it for themselves - but Michael and Jay disapprove, and insist on setting up a family court to decide the fate of the cash. Comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Claire gets her learner driver's licence, but Michael is still reluctant to let her get behind the wheel.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay is dismayed to discover Michael still carries a photograph of an attractive former girlfriend in his wallet, and demands an explanation. Meanwhile, Franklin finds it hard to admit Aretha is actually a very talented singer.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay tries to spend more time with Michael by watching him play golf. Meanwhile, Junior asks Franklin for help with a college application - but ends up cheating.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: When Claire reveals she and Tony have decided to have sex, Michael and Jay panic and try everything to change the lovebirds' minds. Comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing the housemates' reactions to the second eviction, as well as the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs and diary room visits. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The agents chase £4,500 owed to a shipping company by a car parts dealer in Lancashire, but when the debtor arrives, he tries to assault one of the officers. Max and Steve are in east London on a mission to collect over £2,000 owed to a housing association, and Paul and Ben are in north London where they attempt to evict two tenants who owe more than £7,000 in rent arrears.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The officers try to recover £13,000 owed by a high-performance car dealer in Birmingham, and in Wolverhampton the agents chase nearly £2,000 owed to a car hire company. Elsewhere, officers visit a family in Kent to try to collect more than £5,000, but an emotional backstory means they are forced to make a sensitive decision.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary series giving an insight into the world of debt collection. Kevin Stokes and Brian O'Shaughnessy try to collect a debt from a technology company, but with the director nowhere to be seen, the office manager does everything she can to prove the business is no longer trading. Stewart McCracken and Elmor Victor face a heartbreaking house repossession in Merseyside, where two landlords are forced to evict a tenant recovering from a brain tumour which has cost him his job and income.(n)

programme.title: Blind Date
programme.desc: New series. Paul O'Grady hosts a revival of the dating show in which contestants must choose between three unseen suitors based on their answers to a series of questions. The first episode sees a woman from Southport and a man with an eight-inch beard asking the questions, while cameras also follow two strangers from different backgrounds on a blind date in Barcelona.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: Documentary about people living on benefits. Lisa spent seven years in prison for smuggling cocaine, and has been unemployed and on benefits ever since. James is dyslexic and surviving on only £13,000 a year, while Jai quit his job to move to the Scottish Highlands, where he has found little need for his benefit money.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on three couples living on benefits. They include Karen and Paul who once ran a launderette, but after losing their business they now struggle to get by on benefits. Yvonne and David are getting married and planning to make it the best day ever - despite only being paid in a year the same amount as the cost of the average UK wedding. Things are even more bleak for Brian and Rachel, however, as despite being together for 10 years, they cannot afford to move in together.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: Sonia celebrates her freedom with Don Kaplan, but it soon becomes apparent that she is working to her own agenda. Unfortunately for her, so is the homicide detective.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Gang
programme.desc: Female gang members speak about their experiences, revealing the extreme lengths they must go to as they find their own roles within the male-dominated culture. One shows off the weapon cache she keeps close by for protection, while another reveals how she was seduced by a gang member at only 15, after which he forced her into prostitution through violence and manipulation. Plus, the `honey-trap' girls who set up rivals for robbery, the teens who hide weapons and destroy evidence for their gang, and the girlfriend left behind now that her partner is serving life for murder.(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: A working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalised when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: Robin of Locksley returns from the Crusades to find the Sheriff of Nottingham making life miserable for the peasants of Sherwood Forest, and recruits a noble band of allies to help him defeat the dastardly lawman(n)

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone stars as a cop named Marion Cobretti -- Cobra for short -- in this action-thriller whose mile-a-minute pacing, dash of humor, and impressive stunts will entertain the most demanding fans. His partner is Gonzales (Reni Santoni) and both work for a special unit that is called in when ordinary methods fail. Cobra and Gonzales are assigned to track down a serial killer and at the same time protect Ingrid (Brigitte Nielsen), who seems a likely bet to become victim number 17. The action heats up when they discover that the "one" serial killer is really a whole gang of neo-Nazi locos(n)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: This sports-history saga is the fact-based tale of the Texas Western squad that won the 1966 NCAA basketball championship—the first team to do so starting an all-black lineup(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Emotional docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut's Wife
programme.desc: Rand Ravich's sci-fi thriller stars Johnny Depp (soon to be seen as J M Barrie in Neverland) as a Nasa astronaut who loses all contact for two minutes while on a space-walk. Successfully rescued and back on Earth, he gives up his career to join a large corporation, much to the relief of his wife Charlize Theron (The Yards). But, as he starts to act more strangely, she begins to wonder what actually happened in those 120 seconds and what this could mean for their unborn child(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: Denzel Washington and Angelina Jolie costar in this creepy thriller about a serial killer who leaves his victims' bodies with a gruesome calling card. Washington plays a quadriplegic detective who tracks the killer with the help of a tough female cop (Jolie). Queen Latifah, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: In Gary Winick's romantic comedy, Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway star as best friends competing to nab the same location for their wedding reception. When Liv and Emma were girls they attended such an impressive wedding at New York's landmark Plaza Hotel that they swore that, when the time came, they would each celebrate their nuptials there. Twenty years later, after saying 'yes' to their respective fiancés, they've instructed their wedding planner to book the ceremony of their dreams. But because of a clerical error they're both given the same slot - and neither is willing to concede. Instead, their friendship is jettisoned as they resort to underhand tactics in a bid to sabotage each other and fulfil their marriage fantasies... Also starring Candice Bergen, Chris Pratt and Bryan Greenberg(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Political drama based on real-life events about a Texas congressman whose intervention in Afghanistan, supplying weapons and other equipment to rebel troops fighting against the Soviet Union, has far-reaching and unforeseen consequences(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this hilarious comedy. Mitch (Luke Wilson) returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi (Juliette Lewis), involved in a ménage à trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitch's old college buddies, Beanie (Vince Vaughn) and Frank (Will Ferrell). Starring Will Ferrell, Vince Vaughn, Luke Wilson & Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: The Rocker
programme.desc: Two decades after being kicked out of a famous heavy-metal group, a failed fortysomething drummer joins his teen nephew's band(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retired successful business owner and widower (Robert De Niro) lands an internship at a fashion website run by a young, career-driven woman (Anne Hathaway) in this Warner Bros. comedy from writer/director Nancy Meyers (The Holiday, It's Complicated)(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Undercover Brother began life as an animated series on the Internet. The satirical cartoon was created by novelist and screenwriter John Ridley (Three Kings) for the website /urbanentertainment.com. Ridley wrote the screenplay with Michael McCullers, co-writer of the Austin Powers sequels, and it was directed by Malcolm D. Lee (Spike Lee's cousin, and the writer/director of The Best Man). The film stars Eddie Griffin (of TV's Malcolm and Eddie) as Undercover Brother, he of the gold Cadillac convertible and huge Afro, who uses gadgets and disguises to steal from the rich and give to the poor. His activities are discovered by the B.R.O.T.H.E.R.H.O.O.D., a spy organization devoted to subverting The Man (Robert Trumbull) and his henchman, Mr. Feather (Chris Kattan), who use their power over the media to demean black people and destroy racial unity. The spy organization is run by The Chief (Chi McBride), who is constantly screaming at his subordinates. They include Sistah Girl (Aunjanue Ellis), a beautiful martial artist, Conspiracy Brother (Dave Chappelle), who sees white supremacist plots everywhere, and Smart Brother (Gary Anthony Williams, who provided the voice of Undercover Brother in the cartoon), who supplies the operatives with gadgets and information. When a popular black political figure, General Boutwell (Billy Dee Williams), calls a press conference, presumably to announce his presidential candidacy, and instead announces that he's opening a chain of fried chicken restaurants, the B.R.O.T.H.E.R.H.O.O.D. rightly suspects foul play, and recruits Undercover Brother to look into it. He goes undercover as an uptight buppie to work for The Man, but his cover is soon blown, and the seductive White She Devil (Denise Richards) is sent in to use her feminine wiles to destroy Undercover Brother(n)

programme.title: Sgt. Bilko
programme.desc: Steve Martin steps into Phil Silver's shoes for this big-screen version of the classic TV comedy. Bilko's past catches up with him when his old nemesis turns up at the base. Dir: Jonathan Lynn(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Action drama in which 'Dirty' Harry Callahan returns to investigate an underground betting ring in which the participants gamble on the deaths of prominent San Francisco citizens. One such 'dead pool' list contains the names of a rock star, a film critic and a talk-show host, all of whom have been systematically murdered. As Callahan looks further into the murders, he finds another well-known name on the list - his own(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: This well-acted, introspective sports drama follows Miguel (Algenis Perez Soto), a talented Dominican baseball player longing to break into the American big leagues in order to provide financial support for his family. While paying his dues in the minors, Miguel experiences a variety of cultural and language barriers despite the kindness of his host family. After an injury he must contemplate his role in the world as well as baseball. Rayniel Rufino, Andre Holland(n)

programme.title: A Serious Man
programme.desc: Meek physics professor Larry Gopnic finds his life unravelling as he deals with his cheating wife, his layabout brother, his disobedient children, threats to his tenure and a next-door neighbour who likes to sunbathe in the nude(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Jacob and Will Grimm are a sibling pair of con artists specialising in taking advantage of peasant superstitions about witches and curses. But when they are called upon to investigate the disappearance of a number of girls from what is said to be an enchanted forest, they suddenly find themselves at the centre of what might just be a very dark, and very real, fairy tale(n)

programme.title: Sunshine State
programme.desc: A woman and her new husband returns to her hometown roots in coastal northern Florida, and must deal with family, business, and encroaching real estate development(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller about a sleazy book dealer endeavouring to locate a rare occult work. The dealer is hired by a wealthy bibliophile to locate the two remaining copies of a 17th-century book entitled The Nine Gates to the Kingdom of Shadows. As he travels from New York to Madrid and Paris, he learns that the book is rumoured to have been written by the Devil - and to contain the key to conjuring him up(n)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: Three masked intruders terrorise a young couple in a secluded country house(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: A racist Korean War veteran living in a crime-ridden Detroit neighborhood is forced to confront his own lingering prejudice when a troubled Hmong teen from his neighborhood attempts to steal his prized Gran Torino. Decades after the Korean War has ended, ageing veteran Walt Kowalski (Clint Eastwood) is still haunted by the horrors he witnessed on the battlefield. The two objects that matter most to Kowalski in life are the classic Gran Torino that represents his happier days working in a Ford assembly plant, and the M-1 rifle that saved his life countless times during combat. When Kowalski's teenage neighbor (Bee Vang) attempts to steal his Gran Torino as part of a gang initiation rite, the old man manages to catch the aspiring thief at the business end of his well-maintained semi-automatic rifle. Later, due to the pride of the Asian group, the boy is forced to return to Kowalski's house and perform an act of penance. Despite the fact that Kowalski wants nothing to do with the young troublemaker, he realizes that the quickest way out of the situation is to simply cooperate. In an effort to set the teen on the right path in life and toughen him up, the reluctant vet sets him up with an old crony who now works in construction. In the process, Kowalski discovers that the only way to lay his many painful memories to rest is to finally face his own blinding prejudice head-on(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Five Oscars went to this enthralling biography of 20th-century icon Howard Hughes. The epic drama details Hughes' glory years from the 1920s to the '40s, when he earned a vast fortune making films and designing planes, while also romancing Jean Harlow and Katharine Hepburn(n)

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: Control, Hersh and their operatives hold Finch, Shaw and Claypool captive, demanding to know the location of Finch's Machine. However, the trio receive support from an unexpected quarter. Meanwhile, Reese contemplates the nature of his work. Jim Caviezel and Michael Emerson star.(n)

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: Reese catches a last-minute flight to Istanbul under an assumed name, hoping to leave his recent past behind. However, the Machine soon interferes with his plan and manages to divert him onto another flight via Rome. Mystery drama, starring Jim Caviezel and Michael Emerson.(n)

programme.title: The Vanished Family: Aurora Teagarden Mystery 4
programme.desc: After an exhaustive house-hunt, crime-solving librarian Aurora finally purchases her dream home. However, as she sets about moving in, she discovers the property has a murky history, one involving the sudden disappearance of previous owners. Mystery drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Candidate for Crime
programme.desc: An ambitious senatorial candidate murders his campaign manager for threatening to expose his secret affair. To avoid suspicion, the politician makes the killing look as if he was the intended target of an assassination attempt that went wrong - but ends up having to pit his wits against the slovenly sleuth. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Jackie Cooper, Ken Swofford and Tisha Sterling.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An undercover police office is killed by McGee while on duty, and Jenny approves an investigation into the death. But the decision places a strain on her relationship with Gibbs as the team tries to prove that the agent was not culpable, despite the evidence building against him. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part one of two. Kensi is taken into custody as chief suspect in the murder of Marine Sergeant Chris Black, but fancies her chances of catching the real killer herself. Meanwhile, Callen and the rest of the team work to prove their colleague's innocence. Crime drama, starring Daniela Ruah and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part two of two. Kensi goes in search of her father's killer, before bumping into her mother, who she has not seen for more than 15 years. Meanwhile, the discovery that a member of Kensi's father's unit faked his own death prompts Granger to back down from his suspicions of his colleague. Crime drama, starring Daniela Ruah and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team is forced to establish whether the gunning down of a man outside the Vietnamese Consulate is an isolated incident or a terrorist attack, facing a race against time to ensure the safety of delegates at an upcoming international conference. Crime drama, guest starring Dan Lauria (The Wonder Years).(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy intelligence officer, and the choice of murder weapon leads the agents to believe he was killed by a colleague. However, while former Seal Sam threatens to compromise the integrity of the case, evidence suggests the victim may have been selling secrets to the enemy.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part one of two. Hetty dispatches the team to recover a book containing top-secret information, which has been stolen from the personal effects of a murdered antiques dealer. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride becomes convinced that Paul Jenks, the so-called `Baitfish' has returned. Jenks was the former informant who set a bomb that nearly killed Pride's daughter, and Pride is obviously highly motivated to track him down. However, his colleagues become increasingly concerned about the lengths to which he will go to catch his nemesis, including attempts to form an alliance with the Broussard crime family. Scott Bakula and Lucas Black star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a sailor is shot in the champagne room of a strip club, the team links the murder weapon to two additional unsolved cases and discovers the names of all three victims appear on a mural in a dilapidated part of town. Meanwhile, Brody's ex-fiance pays her a surprise visit. Crime drama, starring Scott Bakula, Zoe McLellan and Lucas Black.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager is found beaten and apparently raped on a building site. Her account of the ordeal leads to a media frenzy in which several army cadets are named as suspects and Stabler's job is put in jeopardy. However, a TV channel later gains possession of video tape from the evening of her attack, and it becomes clear she has not been entirely honest.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler arrest a psychiatrist who has taken the law into his own hands and avenged his young son's death at the hands of another child. The case against him seems open and shut - but he mounts a clever defence, using his professional expertise in a bid to escape punishment. With guest star Kyle MacLachlan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cult leader is identified as the seducer of a 12-year-old girl who has been admitted to hospital with pregnancy-related complaints. However, the investigation is hindered by his followers' slavish devotion and refusal to co-operate with the team. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A college student files a claim of rape against her professor, but he insists they had consensual sex. Benson and Stabler weigh up the evidence and try to determine which of them is telling the truth - but over the course of their investigation they find themselves taking opposing sides. Drama, with Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are called to investigate three violent sexual attacks against women. They enlist the aid of Dr Rebecca Hendrix, a policewoman-turned-psychiatrist, who helps them track down a suspect - but he turns out to be homosexual. Mariska Hargitay stars.(n)

programme.title: Person of Interest

Jim Caviezel, Michael Emerson and Joseph Mazzello star.(n)

programme.desc: The shabby sleuth investigates the complex case of a murdered Hollywood gossip writer. Detective drama, with Peter Falk. Patrick McGoohan co-stars and directs.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: A Trace of Murder
programme.desc: A conniving woman yearns to divorce her husband and set up home with her lover - but a pre-nuptial agreement means she stands to lose out. Instead, she devises a cunning plan to nullify the contract, framing her unsuspecting spouse for the murder of a business rival. However, she reckons without the shabby sleuth's unfailing ability to uncover the truth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Shera Danese, Barry Corbin and David Rasche.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: An Exercise in Fatality
programme.desc: The owner of a chain of health clubs kills a business partner who was about to expose his crooked dealings. Making the death look like an unfortunate weightlifting accident, he cunningly creates the perfect alibi using a tape recording of his victim's voice - but he reckons without the intervention of the shabby sleuth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Robert Conrad and Philip Bruns.(n)

programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. programme.desc: Night has fallen upon the Smithsonian Institution in Washington, DC. In this second installment of the Night at the Museum saga, Larry faces a battle so epic it could only unfold in the corridors of the world's largest museum. programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The Smell of Music. Sorely annoyed when Charles (David Ogden Stiers) insists upon playing his French horn incessantly, Hawkeye (Alan Alda) and B.J. (Mike Farrell) issue an ultimatum: Either Charles ceases and desists, or they will refuse to take showers. Before long, the unbathed Hawk and Beej have become so intolerable that they have been "exiled" from the 4077th's mess hall--and practically everywhere else. Ultimately, the feud is settled with a torrent of cold water and a well-calculated "traffic accident", but not before Col. Potter (Harry Morgan) has tackled the more serious issue of a suicidal patient. With this episode, M*A*S*H settled into its fabled Monday-night timeslot, where it would play to spectacular ratings for the next five years(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee
programme.desc: Hugely successful fish-out-of-water comedy. Fighting snakes and crocodiles is Aussie hunter Mike Dundee's hobby. When he meets New York journalist Sue Charlton, their two worlds could not be more different. They meet when Charlton visits Dundee's homeland - the Australian outback - to interview him and find out about his brushes with death at the hands of a vicious crocodile. Intrigued by the man, Charlton invites him to visit her in New York to return his hospitality and, taking up her offer, Dundee is transported to the Big Apple and is amazed at what he finds. Hilarity ensues as Dundee tries to get used to the hustle and bustle of life in an urban jungle as even simple tasks, such as crossing the road leave him confused and bewildered(n)

When dirty bombs are detonated over Southern California, a husband (Rory Cochrane) and his wife (Mary McCormack) become quarantined, he inside their house, she outside. As contaminated ash rains down from the sky, chaos reigns across the area as those left out in the open run the risk of being poisoned by the fatal toxins. The film is the directorial debut of production designer Chris Gorak, who also wrote the script(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels director Guy Ritchie heads back to the London underworld for this hyperkinetic crime comedy concerning a shady land deal that leaves every schemer in the city determined to get rich or die trying. When a Russian mobster orchestrates a lucrative real estate scam, every criminal in London wants a piece of the action. Greed is the universal language, and everyone from unrelenting crime boss Lenny Cole (Tom Wilkinson) to street-smart criminal One Two (Gerard Butler), corrupt accountant Stella (Thandie Newton), and unpredictable punk rocker Johnny Quid (Toby Kebbell) seem to speak it fluently. As the bullets start to fly and the double crosses multiply, there's no telling who will walk away with the fortune after the gun smoke has cleared. Jeremy Piven, Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, and Quantum of Solace Bond girl Gemma Arterton co-star(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner (Edward Norton) have been living in shadows, seeking a cure to his unique condition, which causes him to turn into The Incredible Hulk, a giant green monster, under emotional stress. But the military forces who dream of abusing his powers won't leave him alone. Upon returning to civilization, Banner is ruthlessly pursued by a nightmarish beast whose powers match The Hulk's own. A fight of comic-book proportions ensues as Banner must call upon the hero within to rescue New York City from total destruction(n)

programme.desc: In this film, notorious area criminals are being killed by vigilantes. programme.desc: Col. Terry Childers is a 30-year Marine veteran: a decorated officer with combat experience in Vietnam, Beirut and Desert Storm - a patriot, a hero. But now, the country he served so well has put him on trial for a rescue mission that went terribly wrong. For his attorney, he has chosen Marine Col. Hays Hodges, a comrade-in-arms who owes his life to Childers. Hodges is not the best lawyer in the service, but Childers trusts him as a brother Marine who knows what it's like to risk death under fire. Bound by duty and friendship, Hodges reluctantly takes the case, even as he begins to doubt the man who saved his life in Vietnam three decades ago(n)

Nominated for four Independent Spirit Awards and a Golden Globe(n)

programme.desc: Arnie's at his best as tough L.A. detective John Kimble who must find a drug lord's wife so she can testify in court. Problem is, she's gone into hiding to protect her son. With only the name of the kid's elementary school, Kimble must go undercover... As a kindergarten teacher! Academy Award winner Linda Hunt joins the cast with Academy Award nominee Cathy Moriarty in this great blend of action, thrills, and humor(n)

But as it turns out, the money the crooks are after is in that room. Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Dwight Yoakam, Jared Leto(n)

programme.title: Manhunter

programme.title: Point Break

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Director Peter Weir's first turn behind the camera since 1998's critically acclaimed The Truman Show, Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World is based on two Napoleonic War-era adventure novels in author Patrick O'Brian's Aubrey/Maturin series, Master and Commander and The Far Side of the World. Russell Crowe stars as Captain Jack Aubrey, a high-seas adventurer who maintains a strong bond with ship-surgeon Stephen Maturin (Paul Bettany). After conquering much of Europe already, Napoleon's forces have set their sights on taking Britain, so Aubrey and the crew of his ship, the HMS Surprise, take to the Pacific to intercept any attacking ships from the French fleet. When Aubrey eyes a renegade French super-frigate, the Surprise pursues, leading to an adrenaline-charged chase through the distant reaches of the sea. Edward Woodall, James D'Arcy, and Lee Ingleby also star as members of the Surprise's crew(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Explorer Rick O¿Connell (Brendan Frasier) and his wife Evelyn (Maria Bello) are now retired. But they are also quite bored, so when they are invited by the British government to take a precious gem to China they don¿t think twice. The ancient stone is capable of resurrecting the Emperor Han and of pointing the way to Shangri-La. When the couple reaches China, they meet their son Alex, who has discovered the tomb of Han, and Evelyn's brother Jonathan Carnahan. Centuries ago, the evil Emperor Han was cursed by the sorceress Zi Yuan who transformed him and his army into mummies. When the explorers are betrayed by a friend, the mummy is awoken from a 2,000-year-old curse and now threatens to plunge the world into his merciless, unending service(n)

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Return of the Killer Catfish. A case in Nepal involves a lone fisherman being dragged off his feet and into a mountain river, and Jeremy wonders if a goonch catfish is to blame(n)

programme.title: River Monsters: Legendary Locations
