programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tries to track down wanted terrorist Harper Dearing before another US Navy ship is destroyed, and a desperate Gibbs enlists the aid of a prisoner to draw his target out of hiding. Meanwhile, Palmer is forced to consider putting his nuptials on hold as the stand-off with Dearing becomes heated. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The aftermath of Harper Dearing's bomb attack on the NCIS headquarters dominates proceedings. As rescue crews sift through the debris searching for survivors, Abby, Gibbs, McGee and Vance are accounted for, but Ziva and Tony are trapped in a lift. Dearing makes contact after his ex-wife is taken into custody, enabling his car to be traced to an abandoned lot - and the agents arrive just in time to see the vehicle blow up. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate the death of an armoury employee when divers find her body in a car at the bottom of a lake. The victim had been reported missing since she was evacuated before the blast at NCIS headquarters. Meanwhile, crisis counsellor Miles Wolf carries out psychological assessments of all the agents in the wake of the bombings. Guest starring Steve Valentine (Crossing Jordan).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While on medical leave, Ducky reopens a 12-year-old case by talking officials at a cemetery into releasing the body of a navy commander whose post-mortem he carried out 12 years previously. Meanwhile, the team is called in to investigate the death of a sergeant from carbon monoxide poisoning - and finds a copy of Ducky's exhumation request on the man's laptop. Crime drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. The pilot is initially missing, but his body later washes ashore with a gunshot wound to the head. Things get complicated when one of the crew members tells the agents the chopper was hit by another aircraft, while another states that the pilot tried to kill them all by crashing into the sea on purpose. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Delilah is rushed to hospital when the stress of planning her wedding becomes too much for her. Meanwhile, the team investigates the unexplained death of a healthy petty officer.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs, McGee and Torres travel to a remote area of Paraguay controlled by violent rebels, in search of a Navy Seal who disappeared during an unsanctioned trip. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The Trial Analysis team heads to Miami with JP Nunnelly to work on a drug trafficking case in which both their clients and the jurors' lives are in jeopardy. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The agents suspect a hitman is responsible for the recent murder of an Assistant District Attorney, leading Van Pelt to pose as a potential client to meet him. The killer is arrested and taken to court, but Jane's unorthodox methods cause the trial to fall apart. Suspended from duty, he takes matters into his own hands and discovers who hired the murderer, but puts his and Lisbon's lives in danger. Crime drama, starring Amanda Righetti and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane finds a new adversary in cult leader Bret Stiles, who arouses suspicion when a media mogul who may have questioned his group's activities is found dead. As the team searches for clues, the victim's father receives an anonymous text message warning that a bomb is about to detonate in the building. Crime drama, guest starring Malcolm McDowell (A Clockwork Orange).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A mathematical genius is shot dead and found with his index finger removed. The agents discover he was working on a code-breaking device that could make it possible to hack into any computer - but after finishing it had refused to pass the instrument over to the buyer. When Jane learns another whizz kid knows the whereabouts of the tool, he faces a race against time to stop it falling into the wrong hands. Crime drama, guest starring Lucy Davis (The Office) and Fisher Stevens (Lost).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The leader of an organisation dedicated to eradicating human trafficking is killed before making an important speech, leading the agents to suspect the killer was desperate to stop the presentation. Self-proclaimed psychic Kristina Frye joins the team to help with the investigation, and soon discovers the victim was going to expose a shocking truth about his own association. Guest starring Leslie Hope (24) and Eugene Byrd (Heroes), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Police believe a college student was the latest victim of Red John, prompting Kristina Frye to make a televised appeal for the elusive murderer to come forward. Remembering how his own TV appearance led to the death of his family, a furious Jane tries to protect the self-proclaimed psychic - only to discover the serial killer may be one step ahead of him. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, with Leslie Hope (24).(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Devil Wears a Lapel Pin.
programme.desc: Stan is enlisted to organise the CIA calendar, but Hayley sets out to destroy it. Elsewhere, Roger fakes his own death to avoid paying a huge balance on a credit card.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A mishap at home with charity drive chocolates lands Steve in trouble at school, and he is placed in the `At-Risk' class with the student body's worst trouble-makers.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger runs off in disguise as a Julia Roberts character to a small town after Stan hurts his feelings. Steve plans a meeting when he finds out that Jeff and Barry have never met.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Quagmire is reunited with a former lover when the guys travel to South Korea to retrieve the final episode of a soap he starred in while he was in the army. Stewie is concerned that he will become a redhead.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie impregnates himself with Brian's DNA to save their friendship, while Peter and the guys try to make a viral video.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg gets a new job at the airport, and soon discovers she is the most attractive woman working there. Cleveland becomes a therapist and gives relationship advice to Peter and Lois.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine sets out to help news anchor Greg after he and his partner Terry split up. Meanwhile, Roger becomes obsessed with a fictional boy from an old game called Dream Phone.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: In the wake of an apocalyptic disaster known as The Blast, a tattooed and haunted Stan wanders through the barren wasteland that was once Langley Falls, tormented by the mysterious Two Hundred, which has terrorised the town, and seperated the agent from his family. The 200th episode of the animated comedy, featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Joe decides to embrace life by quitting his job with the police and taking the guys on a road trip to the Niagara Falls, where he makes an unexpected decision.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian is sent to obedience classes, but Peter has a change of heart when the training robs the dog of his assertive nature. Chris makes a new friend at school, but feels betrayed when he learns he is only using their friendship to get closer to Meg.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve uses skills taught by his dad to save the Smiths when Stan ousts him from the family home and replaces him with the malicious Barry. Meanwhile, Roger proves he has what it takes to become a fraternity brother.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Haunting memories prompt Francine to woo George Clooney with the intention of breaking his heart. However, Stan actually falls for him and ruins her plan. Back at home, Roger sets up a sweatshop staffed by foster children.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is upset when his friends publicly make fun of him, so decides to find a more supportive social circle by befriending a group of women. However, Lois warns him that while his new friends may seem less harsh than the guys, they are probably talking about him behind his back.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter claims he could beat Liam Neeson in a fight, but is challenged to prove it. Lois becomes a class helper and pays more attention to the other children than she does to Stewie, while Quagmire organises a festival celebrating his own sexual history.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A plan to con Steve into attending summer camp goes horribly wrong, leaving him interned with a group of refugees. Stan joins him, and manages to stage an Olympics-style competition between the inmates and a rebel faction living nearby. Featuring the guest voice of Thandie Newton.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The American Dad After School Special.
programme.desc: Stan realises he has a weight problem and decides to get into shape - but an overzealous diet and exercise regimen leaves him with anorexia, putting his life at risk. Fortunately, Steve makes a personal sacrifice to help save the day. Animated comedy, featuring the voice of Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The driver of a Ferrari is gunned down by a motorcyclist and the victim is identified as petty officer Colin Boxer, who was holding down a second job as a valet parker and had borrowed the sports car. The owner of the vehicle turns out to be Vijay Chaya, the billionaire head of a large corporation, and the team suspects a case of mistaken identity. During the course of the investigation, Gibbs chances on a medal awarded to Leroy Jethro Moore, the man he was named after and an estranged friend of his father. Guest starring Billy Dee Williams (The Empire Strikes Back) and Ralph Waite (The Waltons).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tony reviews satellite footage of rebel forces in the Middle East and spots Kersey among a group of insurgents, concluding that Joe Westcott's fear of him was well-founded. Back at HQ, Abby creates a 3D computer model of the attack that occurred in Afghanistan and Joe dons a virtual-reality headset to relive the traumatic events. Will it jog his memory?.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Teenager Lydia Wade manages to escape a gang of masked men trying to abduct her and her friend Rosie, the daughter of a US Navy commander. Lydia's Navy captain father David Wade was shot dead during the attack and her mother is overseas, so Ziva offers to look after the girl, while Abby tries to jog her memory by creating facial reconstructions of the attackers based on some grainy CCTV footage. DiNozzo and McGee find links on Rosie's laptop to possible suspect John `Diesel' Stevens.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is called to the scene when there is an attempt on the life of FBI agent TC Fornell, with the assailant identified as Navy seaman Tyler Brown. The pair team up and visit the bar where Brown worked and bump into their mutual ex-wife Diane Sterling, who was operating undercover as an employee suspected of stealing customers' identities. Joe Spano and Melinda McGraw guest star.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is unsure of his future with the California Bureau of Investigation following his confrontation with serial killer Red John. Police chief Gale Bertram calls on the consultant's help when a prominent lawyer and Statehouse lobbyist is kidnapped, but finds him reluctant to join the investigation. Crime drama, guest starring Michael Gaston (Jericho), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is forced to help his estranged brother-in-law, who has become embroiled in a murder investigation. Despite his reservations, the consultant joins the case, but is forced to face his dubious past and encounters a number of old acquaintances. Crime drama, guest starring Kevin Rankin (Bionic Woman), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A murder case leads Jane into conflict with charismatic cult leader Bret Stiles, whom he first met while investigating the death of a media mogul. The consultant is surprised when his antagonist offers him information regarding the identity of serial killer Red John, and the location of missing psychic Kristina Frye. Guest starring Malcolm McDowell (Heroes), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A man convicted of murder and rape is released from jail because of faulty DNA evidence and subsequently killed, prompting Jane and the team to investigate his death. However, it soon becomes apparent that more than one person wanted revenge on him. Guest starring Jack Coleman (Heroes), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The case of a murdered jockey leads Jane and the team into the murky underworld of horse racing, where they uncover a number of suspects. Crime drama, guest starring Jim Beaver (Deadwood) and Olesya Rulin (High School Musical), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: The Honeymoon Is Over. Season 3 opener starts in a Paris hotel room as Molly is packing up to leave. Mike has enjoyed France so much he's gone native (growing a little moustache and dressing like a French man) and doesn't want to leave. On the plane, we learn Molly is excited to get home and start their life together as a married couple, but Mike wants to travel the world. Molly wants to get back because she thinks Joyce, Victoria and Vince will have run amok without her there and Mike thinks Carl has probably fallen apart without him. As they're flying back, there's turbulence and scares the wanderlust out of Mike. Meanwhile, at home, Joyce, Victoria and Vince have enjoyed getting to do what they want and Carl has a "man-crush" on his temp partner who is uber-masculine(n)

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: Vince Takes a Bath. When Vince throws his back out during a late night rendezvous with Joyce and she goes AWOL, Mike and Molly get stuck taking care of him. Joyce tells Molly that Vince's health problems brought back memories of the quick deterioration of Molly's father, and that she couldn't bear that kind of pain again. Meanwhile, Mike and Molly struggle to write personalized thank you notes for their wedding gifts(n)

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: Mike Likes Cake. Molly gets frustrated when all of her wedding photos with Mike turn out terribly. In every photo, he's either slackjawed, eating something, or has his eyes closed. She also gets frustrated with Harry, who's initial edit of her wedding video featured a lot of Victoria's cleavage, Mike sneaking food, and terrible voiceover. Meanwhile, Carl gets jealous and overprotective when Christina's ex-husband, James, comes back into the picture. His fears turn out to be founded, however, when Christina tells him she wants to give James another chance for their son(n)

programme.desc: A single father finds his lackluster parenting skills coming back to haunt him in this Adam Sandler comedy directed by Sean Anders (Sex Drive). As a teenage father, Donny (Sandler) struggled to raise his son Todd (Andy Samberg) until Todd was old enough to strike out on his own. Subsequently estranged from his father for years, Todd is about to marry the love of his life when Donny turns up determined to form the father-son bond they never had. programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: A single father finds his lackluster parenting skills coming back to haunt him in this Adam Sandler comedy directed by Sean Anders (Sex Drive). As a teenage father, Donny (Sandler) struggled to raise his son Todd (Andy Samberg) until Todd was old enough to strike out on his own. Subsequently estranged from his father for years, Todd is about to marry the love of his life when Donny turns up determined to form the father-son bond they never had. Now the harder Donny tries to connect with his long-lost son, the more furious Todd's future bride grows with the unwelcomed intruder and his obnoxious antics. Leighton Meester and James Caan co-star(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons

Can the Simpson and Flanders families join forces to rescue Bart?(n)

programme.desc: The Mook, the Chef, the Wife and Her Homer. Lisa's friendship with Fat Tony's son Michael prompts mob boss Tony to invite the Simpsons over for dinner. Michael says he'd rather be a chef than take over the family business, but that's before Tony is shot by a rival mobster. programme.title: Vice Versa

While the horrified father struggles to cope with a world of teachers and school bullies, the youngster is revelling in the perks of being a grown-up. Fantasy comedy, starring Judge Reinhold, Fred Savage, Swoosie Kurtz and Corinne Bohrer.(n)

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Regardless
programme.desc: A businessman starts up an odd-job agency, but employs seven hopeless handymen incapable of completing any task without causing utter chaos. Slapstick comedy, starring Sid James, Charles Hawtrey and Kenneth Williams.(n)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
programme.desc: The modern-day teenage son of the Greek god Poseidon must lead his friends on a perilous journey into the Bermuda triangle. They need to recover the legendary Golden Fleece to save the world, but getting to it means braving all manner of terrifying monsters. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Logan Lerman and Alexandra Daddario.(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: An idle womaniser pretends to be a father to meet women in a single mothers' group - but he starts to change his selfish ways when a lonely youngster with a depressed mum becomes emotionally attached to him. Romantic comedy adapted from Nick Hornby's novel, starring Hugh Grant, Toni Collette, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Weisz.(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman.(n)

programme.title: The Boxer from Shantung
programme.desc: Ma Yung Chen leaves his rural home to seek his fortune in Shanghai, but is drawn into the criminal underworld after befriending a gang boss. Ma then begins his own rise through the ranks, but danger lies in wait in the shape of the Four Champions gang. Martial arts adventure, starring Chen Kuan Tai. In Mandarin.(n)

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Underwater demolition experts embark on a mission to find a safe landing site for the US military to launch an invasion on a South Pacific island occupied by Japanese army and navy forces. But first the commander and his men must put aside their personal differences to ensure the mission is successful. Thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Gary Merrill.(n)

programme.title: Fast Girls

Drama, with Lenora Crichlow, Lily James, Rupert Graves and Noel Clarke, who also co-wrote the script.(n)

programme.title: Congo

The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichton's novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov.(n)

programme.title: Rio 2

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Bob Monkhouse: Million Joke Man
programme.sub-title: The King of the Game Shows.
programme.desc: Paul O'Grady presents a retrospective look at the career of comedian Bob Monkhouse, which spanned more than half a century. He reflects on the 1970s and 1980s, when Monkhouse became the undisputed king of the TV game shows, hosting The Golden Shot, Celebrity Squares and Bob's Full House. Featuring rare and often previously unseen archive and contributions from friends.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.sub-title: In Luton Airport No One Can Hear You Scream.
programme.desc: The Meldrews return from an overseas holiday to find yet another disaster awaiting them - their home has been demolished. Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie star.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber is feeling dejected after his romantic fortunes take a turn for the worse, so Fletch tries to revive his friend's flagging spirits. However, his cunning plan has one potential drawback - it involves his own daughter. Comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: A Short Introduction to Cooper's Rules.
programme.desc: Local PCs Cooper and Walsh try to master a new crime-fighting technique. However, the duo's carefully laid plans unravel when Barry decides to treat a retired vicar to a day trip. Long-running sitcom, starring Ken Kitson and Louis Emerick.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: The women of the village are impressed by a series of fanciful tales told by a retired jewel thief about his larcenous exploits in the south of France. However, the scoundrel's skills are put to the test when Marina and Miss Davenport seek his aid in helping Auntie Wainwright crack a keyless safe. John Challis guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: All That Glitters Is Not Elvis.
programme.desc: When Alvin and Entwistle witness Lance attempting to prove to his wife that Elvis Presley is still alive, the duo feel duty-bound to help him out, and organise for the King himself to make an appearance. Long-running comedy starring Brian Murphy, Burt Kwouk and Kenneth Cope.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: A weeping statue in the local church gives Del an idea for a money-making scheme to help a hospice under threat of closure. However, his efforts are thwarted by the weather. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?.
programme.desc: An old friend returns from Australia flushed with success and offers Del a share in his business empire Down Under. Although the prospect is tempting, it would mean leaving Nelson Mandela House and little brother Rodney behind. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Always one to jump on the latest passing bandwagon, Del-Boy goes eco-friendly and decides to create a better world for baby Damien and his generation - by starting his own bottled water business. Starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Buster Merryfield and Tessa Peake-Jones. Christmas special from 1992.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy becomes a yuppie, complete with red braces, Filofax and chrome briefcase. Meanwhile, Rodney begins attending a computer course at night school, where he meets Cassandra. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Dodgy dealer Del gets his hands on a consignment of self-inflating rubber dolls, which turn out to be filled with explosive gas. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: A retired jeweller offers Del-Boy the deal of a lifetime - then suddenly has a heart attack and gets taken to hospital with a briefcase containing 250 cut-price gold necklaces still chained to his wrist. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del enters one of Rodney's old paintings in a competition and is over the moon when he wins a holiday for three at a five-star hotel in Majorca. Soon after, the Trotter brothers and Cassandra arrive at Palma Airport - but Del-Boy reveals there is a slight snag. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Gwyneth Strong.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del's beloved mum apparently makes contact during a seance at the Nag's Head, inspiring him to visit the doctor to seek treatment for stomach cramps. Admitted to hospital for tests, he fears there is something seriously wrong with him - but a bacon sandwich and an alcoholic drink smuggled in by Rodney soon put the smile back on his face. Comedy, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney ties the knot with Cassandra, but Del has more on his mind than best man duties as the dreaded Driscoll brothers arrive at the Nag's Head baying for his blood over some stolen mobile phones. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Gwyneth Strong.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Return of the comedy about a self-appointed community leader in Sparkhill, Birmingham. Mrs Khan lays down the law when Alia fails her exams, telling her husband to sign up their daughter at the Muslim Academy. But when he finds out how much it costs, he decides there's a better option. Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Maya Sondhi and Bhavna Limbachia star.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Mr Khan is eager to get himself onto the mosque committee, but when he visits the manager to enrol his mother-in-law on an activity course, the conversation ends in a disagreement and the self-appointed community leader walks out in a huff. Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor and Adlyn Ross star.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: A local MP visits the mosque to endorse its mobile health-check unit and Mr Khan takes future son-in-law Amjad as his guinea pig - but things don't quite go to plan. Meanwhile, Mrs Khan and the girls are off to buy clothes for a friend's new baby. Comedy, starring Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Abdullah Afzal, Maya Sondhi and Bhavna Limbachia.(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Manny decides to broaden the customers' horizons and organises a festival of travel writing - but is horrified when Fran falls for the well-groomed guest speaker. Bernard, meanwhile, is preoccupied with a new neighbour who looks set to take him to court - and decides to take matters into his own hands. Guest starring Julian Rhind-Tutt (Green Wing).(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: While Bernard seems quite happy in the filthy shop, Manny and Fran decide a change of scenery is well overdue, and plan a big night out. However, it soon becomes clear the hirsute store assistant has his sights set firmly on a very specific event - and everyone has to dig out their boogie shoes. Final episode of the cult comedy, starring Dylan Moran, Bill Bailey and Tamsin Greig.(n)

programme.title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl
programme.desc: The legendary US performance, including the parrot sketch, the lumberjack song and a suspiciously-male looking seabird vendor. Comedy, starring John Cleese, Graham Chapman, Eric Idle, Michael Palin and Terry Gilliam.(n)

programme.title: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
programme.desc: Comedy horror spoof, in which Dr Liz Asher receives a dire warning from a psychic cat about a dark force operating in Romford. When a patient mysteriously dies, she teams up with fellow medic Rick Dagless to battle the forces of evil.(n)

programme.title: Steve Coogan: The Man Who Thinks He's It
programme.desc: Footage of the comedian's 1998 set at the Palace Theatre Manchester during his 200-date national tour, featuring characters including Alan Partridge, Paul and Pauline Calf, Tony Ferrino and Duncan Thicket. With Simon Pegg and Julia Davis.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.sub-title: We Have Put Her Living in the Tomb.
programme.desc: Victor and Margaret agree to pet-sit a tortoise for a friend who ought to know better, and an anniversary outing to the theatre ends in disaster. Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie star.(n)

programme.title: The Interviews
programme.desc: Profile of Frankie Howerd, using archive interviews he gave to various TV chat show hosts during the 1970s and 1980s. Howerd is best remembered for the monologues he performed on stage and in sitcoms such as Up Pompeii. Narrated by Tamsin Greig.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: He Ain't Heavy, He's My Uncle.
programme.desc: Uncle Albert falls victim to muggers, so Del-Boy resolves to take the law into his own hands, while Rodney becomes a director in Trotters Independent Traders - and his first job is to give the car a good clean. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.desc: Del's beloved mum apparently makes contact during a seance at the Nag's Head, inspiring him to visit the doctor to seek treatment for stomach cramps. Admitted to hospital for tests, he fears there is something seriously wrong with him - but a bacon sandwich and an alcoholic drink smuggled in by Rodney soon put the smile back on his face. Comedy, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Return of the comedy about a self-appointed community leader in Sparkhill, Birmingham. Mrs Khan lays down the law when Alia fails her exams, telling her husband to sign up their daughter at the Muslim Academy. But when he finds out how much it costs, he decides there's a better option. Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Maya Sondhi and Bhavna Limbachia star.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Mr Khan is eager to get himself onto the mosque committee, but when he visits the manager to enrol his mother-in-law on an activity course, the conversation ends in a disagreement and the self-appointed community leader walks out in a huff. Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor and Adlyn Ross star.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: A local MP visits the mosque to endorse its mobile health-check unit and Mr Khan takes future son-in-law Amjad as his guinea pig - but things don't quite go to plan. Meanwhile, Mrs Khan and the girls are off to buy clothes for a friend's new baby. Comedy, starring Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Abdullah Afzal, Maya Sondhi and Bhavna Limbachia.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney ties the knot with Cassandra, but Del has more on his mind than best man duties as the dreaded Driscoll brothers arrive at the Nag's Head baying for his blood over some stolen mobile phones. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Gwyneth Strong.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: He Ain't Heavy, He's My Uncle.
programme.desc: Uncle Albert falls victim to muggers, so Del-Boy resolves to take the law into his own hands, while Rodney becomes a director in Trotters Independent Traders - and his first job is to give the car a good clean. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: The Imam calls a special fast, and Mr Khan uses it to compete with mosque manager Dave - but low blood sugar and a dodgy bladder mean he's a ticking time bomb. So when Mrs Khan insists he visits the building society manager, asking for a loan to put down on a flat for Shazia and Amjad, it turns out it's not one of her best ideas. Comedy, starring Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Matthew Cottle and Maya Sondhi.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Shazia, Amjad and Mrs Khan go off to sample a trial day at an exclusive gym, but Mr Khan is busy trying to secure a famous Pakistani cricketer to operate the tombola at the Eid festival. To help track him down he is using his newfangled gadget - the internet. Having located the man he wants, he arranges to meet him at the mosque - but a case of mistaken identity leads to another mix-up at a yoga class, with Khan, as usual, right in the centre.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Mr Khan is eager to appear in a video for the mosque, confident that as a fine example of Pakistani manhood, he would be the perfect star. Unfortunately, it seems that director Dave wants to promote a more modern image and chooses Sajid, an attractive, `metrosexual' friend of the family - who at that moment is at home with Mrs Khan. But what are the pair up to? Adil Ray and Shobu Kapoor star.(n)

programme.title: Men Behaving Badly
programme.desc: Gary invents a promiscuous past to hide his sexual inexperience from Dorothy. Meanwhile, Tony tries to impress Deborah with his athletic prowess by turning up at her keep-fit class - but soon regrets his rash move. Comedy, starring Martin Clunes, Neil Morrissey, Leslie Ash and Caroline Quentin.(n)

programme.title: Men Behaving Badly
programme.desc: The housemates have a sleepless night as pyjama-clad Gary goes in search of a 24-hour chemist to cure Dorothy's indigestion and Deborah sends Tony to mend a squeaking fence. Comedy, starring Martin Clunes, Neil Morrissey, Leslie Ash and Caroline Quentin.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: After six weeks of tough competition, the five remaining hopefuls enter the last week - four nights of culinary challenges after which one of them will be crowned MasterChef Champion. They begin by cooking a five-course dinner in memory of Winston Churchill at Cambridge University's Churchill College, trying to replicate a menu devised by leading chef Michael Caines. After that it's back to the kitchen to produce a dish inspired by a personal hero - and for one unlucky cook, this will be the last time they wear their MasterChef apron.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The finalists are sent to learn new skills in Sweden, where they experience two very different restaurants. The first has no menu, with the chefs inventing dishes on the day with whatever ingredients their suppliers provide, and in the second, everything is cooked over an open fire. Back in the UK, they have to come up with an exceptional fish dish for John Torode, Gregg Wallace and renowned seafood chef Nathan Outlaw, with one more amateur leaving at the end of the show.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food takes a gastronomic tour along the canal systems of southern France, from Bordeaux to Marseille. He samples seafood and regional cuisine, as well as exploring a variety of traditional recipes, including artichoke salad with poached egg, eels in cider, and bass with beurre blanc.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food explores the banks of the River Garonne on board a 100-year-old converted barge, and savours the delights of French provincial cooking including magret de canard and petit sale. Other dishes featured are clams in white garlic sauce, eels in parsley and garlic butter, and steak tartare.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef's travels take him along the Canal Lateral a la Garonne, where he goes fishing for shad, and is invited to attend a barbecue lunch. He also investigates the produce on offer at Nerac's local market, and joins the villagers of Bruch for a snail dish.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food continues his barge excursion through south-west France, visiting the city of Agen and tasting the first melon of the season in Quercy before cooking the famous Gascon dish poule au pot.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef's travels take him to the River Tarn, where he joins a local angler to fish for pike. He also rustles up a popular confit of duck with braised red cabbage, and meets a chef in Moissac whose dishes are a celebration of seasonal specialities.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food continues his barge journey through south-west France, sampling the famous sausages as he reaches Toulouse and creating the country's most popular ready-meal cassoulet further downstream.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick's barge trip brings him to Castelnaudary, where he visits the canteen of the French Foreign Legion, prepares a spicy tagine with couscous and enjoys a three-course lunch consisting of roast leg of veal with potato gratin dauphinioise, goats' cheese and strawberries.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall sets himself a challenge when he takes charge of a gamekeeper's cottage and develops speargun fishing and hunting skills.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall goes pike fishing in the river Piddle and creates a dish worthy of tempting the reluctant palate of the local keeper. He also teams up with a group of fruit-picking students on Ford Abbey Farm and is rewarded with a bowl of Ukrainian borscht.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Intrepid chef Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall competes in the Beaminster Summer Show, preparing raspberry jam, chutney and a Victoria sponge. Before the big event, Hugh witnesses the amazing spectacle of thousands of mating spider crabs and manages to rustle up a pasta dish on the quayside.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Mice invade the cottage, so Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall calls in a humane disposal team, who use crystals, sage and kindness to relocate them. The intrepid chef then rustles up a vegan feast for the rodent-busters - high-speed risotto, cooked outdoors.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall orders a wickerwork eel trap and finds a roadkill rabbit the perfect bait. Joining cider enthusiasts to collect windfall apples, he tests the claim that the local brew really is so pure it won't cause a hangover, before staggering out to offer his services as a beater on a shoot.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall brings home the bacon, reaping the rewards of seven months' hard work, and takes a lesson in catching razor fish. He prepares a feast as a thank-you party for all the friends who have made his stay in Dorset possible.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall goes back to the gamekeeper's cottage in West Dorset for another taste of the good life, and enters a local nettle eating competition.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley Whittingstall struggles with his rabbits, is pleased to discover an overheating vegetable shelter doubles up as a sauna, and treats the local vet to the cooked testicles of his castrated calf.(n)

programme.title: Blast From the Past
programme.desc: In 1962, Calvin Webber (Christopher Walken) was a brilliant but somewhat paranoid scientist living with his Donna Reed-esque wife, Helen (Sissy Spacek), in Los Angeles. In the midst of the Cuban Missile Crisis, a plane crashed into the Webber's yard. Mistaking the blast for "the big one," the Webbers moved into their elaborate bomb shelter to wait out the half-life of radioactive fallout. In the shelter, now a sort of time capsule, Calvin and Helen conceived and raised their son Adam (played as an adult by Brendan Fraser). For 35 years, Adam was raised on Jackie Gleason, Perry Como, and stories about life on the surface. Calvin taught his son about science, baseball, and communists while Mom taught Adam about dancing, good manners, and charming young ladies. Just in time, too, as Adam is sent to the surface to gather supplies and find a wife, preferably a nice, non-mutant girl from Pasadena with which to repopulate the world. Once this "fish out of water" story is set up, the fish, Adam, is set adrift in a sea of supermarkets and adult bookstores, but is soon caught by Eve Rustikov (Alicia Silverstone). Completely lost above ground, Adam enlists Eve's help to navigate his new world and find the supplies on his list. The literally sheltered Adam falls for this bitter, cynical, street-smart woman who grew up in a bleak Los Angeles with little use for love. Living with her gay roommate, Troy (Dave Foley), Eve has had her hopes chipped away by a long line of dead-end jobs and loser boyfriends. When the throwback Adam enters her life with his sunny disposition, seersucker jacket, and joy at seeing the sky, she can't help but fall in love(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War

During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom. (Extended Edition)(n)

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: This thrilling action film offers non-stop, runaway adventure down the streets and freeways of L.A. Howard Payne is the psychotic villain who is first seen sabotaging a high-rise elevator. He will spare the passengers in exchange for cash. Enter Jack Traven and the S.W.A.T. team who in a daring rescue save the elevator and shoot Payne. Unfortunately Payne didn't die and later tells Traven his newest scheme: he has wired a Santa Monica bus, travelling during morning rush hour on the freeway, to explode if it goes under 50 mph. Jack gets on board and has to deal with a variety of panicky passengers while trying to gain control of the vehicle helmed by a wounded driver. Annie, recently arrested for speeding, replaces the driver. Now, under pressure from both passengers and headquarters, it is up to Jack to disarm the bomb. After a spectacular scene where the bus jumps a 50 foot gap in an overpass, the police guide it to the airport and disarm it. But Payne is still busy at work. His actions lead to one final, fatal face-off on a hellish subway ride(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Rell (Jordan Peele) becomes attached to an adorable kitten named Keanu while dealing with a painful breakup. But when he returns home one night with his cousin Clarence (Keegan-Michael Key), he is devastated to learn that his house has been burglarized and his feline friend is missing. The nerdy duo attempt to find the culprits who took Keanu, and they eventually get in way over their heads as their search leads them to infiltrate a violent street gang. programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: This thrilling action film offers non-stop, runaway adventure down the streets and freeways of L.A. Howard Payne is the psychotic villain who is first seen sabotaging a high-rise elevator. He will spare the passengers in exchange for cash. Enter Jack Traven and the S.W.A.T. team who in a daring rescue save the elevator and shoot Payne. Unfortunately Payne didn't die and later tells Traven his newest scheme: he has wired a Santa Monica bus, travelling during morning rush hour on the freeway, to explode if it goes under 50 mph. Jack gets on board and has to deal with a variety of panicky passengers while trying to gain control of the vehicle helmed by a wounded driver. Annie, recently arrested for speeding, replaces the driver. Now, under pressure from both passengers and headquarters, it is up to Jack to disarm the bomb. After a spectacular scene where the bus jumps a 50 foot gap in an overpass, the police guide it to the airport and disarm it. But Payne is still busy at work. His actions lead to one final, fatal face-off on a hellish subway ride(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: 06/14/2017. An interview with Sergey Kovalev; a breakdown of the Andre Ward-Kovalev rematch; a recap of Terence Crawford's New York fight; and a look back at the David Tua vs. Ike Ibeabuchi 1997 heavyweight bout(n)

programme.desc: 06-16-2017. Breitbart News' Alex Marlow and comedian Eddie Izzard are the interview guests. The panelists are political scientist Ian Bremmer and counterterrorism expert Malcolm Nance(n)

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Beginning in the 1930's, The English Patient tells the story of Count Almásy who is a Hungarian map maker employed by the Royal Geographical Society to chart the vast expanses of the Sahara Desert along with several other prominent explorers. As World War II unfolds, Almásy enters into a world of love, betrayal, and politics that is later revealed in a series of flashbacks while Almásy is on his death bed after being horribly burned in a plane crash(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Andy Tennant's comedy adventure stars Matthew McConaughey as Benjamin Finnegan, a treasure hunter who finally pins down the Carribbean location of a sunken Spanish galleon loaded with gold. He convinces his ex-wife Tess to use her persuasive powers to get her boss Nigel Honeycutt to lend him his luxury cruiser to use to dive for the treasure. But as they head out to the wreck, they have to beat Benjamin's mentor Moe Fitch and gangster rapper Bigg Bunny, who also have designs on the treasure(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: An old-fashioned cop emerges to foil a high-tech attack on the country's computer infrastructure as Bruce Willis brings back one of the biggest action franchises in screen history. It's been over a decade since audiences last saw New York cop John McClane (Willis), but now, as the world's greatest criminal mastermind (Timothy Olyphant) attempts to cripple the entire country with an innovative act of technological terrorism, only one cop can insure that the integrity of the system stays intact. In this, the fourth installment of the long-running action series, Underworld director Len Wiseman picks up the torch formerly carried by directors John McTiernan and Renny Harlin to helm a script penned by Mark Bomback(n)

programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, bumbling private eye Holland March (Ryan Gosling) and muscle-for-hire Jackson Healy (Russell Crowe) become unlikely partners when they find themselves both looking for a missing woman named Amelia (Margaret Qualley) following the death of a high-profile porn star. Amelia's ties to the deceased actress are unclear, but as other members of the porn industry turn up dead, March and Healy's investigation reveals a much bigger conspiracy than the duo could have ever anticipated. With the help of March's teenage daughter Holly (Angourie Rice), their sleuthing eventually unearths corruption within the federal government. Shane Black (Iron Man 3) directed and co-wrote this action buddy comedy, which co-stars Kim Basinger and Matt Bomer(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: American Psycho is an extraordinary and disturbing satire that stares deep into the heart of the materialistic world of the 80s yuppie and finds only superficiality and ultra violence. Based on the controversial book by Bret Easton Ellis, the film charts the descent of narcissistic Patrick Bateman from a hard-nosed and ruthless city type to an obscene serial killer. Mixing extremely black comedy with shocking violence, it is Bale's superb deadpan performance that gels things together, and with Mary Harron's astute direction it becomes a film that truly lingers long after the credits roll(n)

programme.title: Renaissance Man
programme.desc: Danny DeVito stars in this thoughtful comedy about Bill Rago, an advertising executive who gets fired from his job and is forced to take on an army job teaching poorly educated boot camp recruits to read. With a little ingenuity, he gets them reading Shakespeare's Hamlet, but finds opposition in the guise of Sgt Cass (Gregory Hines), who dislikes civilians and thinks he is wasting his time teaching screw-ups to think for themselves. Also stars Ed Begley Jr and a young Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: The Last of the Blonde Bombshells
programme.desc: After her husband dies, an English widow picks up her tenor sax and hunts down her former swing bandmates, and urges them to play again(n)

programme.desc: A businessman finds he and his friends the prisoners of a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion(n)

programme.title: Quick Change
programme.desc: Bill Murray co-directed (along with Howard Franklin) this mixture of The Out-of-Towners and After Hours, concerning Grimm (Bill Murray), a frustrated city planner who is fed up with the corruption and venality of New York City. Getting together a couple of accomplices -- Phyllis (Geena Davis), who admires Grimm for his audacity, and Loomis (Randy Quaid), a follower to Grimm's leader since grade school -- Grimm decides to rob a bank, pocket the money, get out of town and take off to tropical splendor. Dressing in a clown suit, Grimm devises a unique way to rob a bank -- taking a group of hostages at the bank and inviting the police to surround the bank. Amazingly, although pursued by a police chief (Jason Robards), the trio manage to pull off the robbery. However, the problems really start when they try to get from the bank to the airport -- which proves to be more difficult than the robbery(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Beauty and the Beast. Happily Ever After always presents a non-traditional look at classic fairy tales. Children learn to look beneath the surface in the African-American version of Beauty and the Beast. An all-star cast populates this story, with Vanessa Williams playing Beauty, Gregory Hines as the Beast, and Paul Winfield playing the father. When Beauty must keep company with the Beast to save her father's life, she is surprised by her change of heart. She soon learns that true goodness can lie beneath a rough exterior. The video features "Could She, Would She, Will She" and "Wave Goodbye." This family friendly program is recommended for ages four to nine(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Astro Boy
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage heads a stellar cast in David Bowers' animation, adapted from a manga comic-book character, about a robot boy (Freddie Highmore) who is simultaneously trying to save the world and find his place in it. Brilliant scientist Dr Tenma (Cage) is left devastated when his young son is killed during an experiment, and tries to recreate a robotic version of the boy, only to abandon him when he fails to meet expectations. Left to fend for himself, the robot becomes Astro Boy, possessed of a host of useful powers, not the least of which is the ability to fire bullets from his backside. When he becomes embroiled in a plot to exploit a new source of energy, Astro Boy must use all of his gifts to defeat the forces of evil. The array of vocal talent in attendance includes Samuel L Jackson, Donald Sutherland, Bill Nighy, Nathan Lane, Charlize Theron, Kristen Bell and Little Britain's Matt Lucas(n)

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: The Great Muppet Caper is the second Muppet film and it is considerably more complex than its predecessor, The Muppet Movie, which was essentially just a road movie. As the film begins, Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are reporters who have failed to bag a story of a London jewel heist, which happened under their watch. The real criminals managed to escape and frame Miss Piggy as the thief. Kermit, Fozzie and the Great Gonzo set out on a mission to solve the mystery and track down the criminals who stole the Baseball Diamond. There are fewer star cameos and songs in The Great Muppet Caper than in The Muppet Movie, although appearances from John Cleese and Charles Grodin are particularly memorable(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Through a series of misunderstandings, Alvin, Simon and Theodore come to believe that Dave is going to propose to his new girlfriend in New York City and dump them. They have three days to get to him and stop the proposal, saving themselves not only from losing Dave but possibly from gaining a terrible stepbrother(n)

programme.title: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
programme.desc: A live-action, Mandarin-language adaptation of the popular 1958 children's book by author Zhang Tianyi, The Secret of the Magic Gourd follows the wondrous adventures of a young schoolboy named Wang Bao. When Wang Bao discovers a magical gourd that can instantly grant his every wish, the awkward child suddenly becomes a hero amongst his curious classmates. When the gourd proves more of a burden than a blessing and the boy decides to get rid of it, he quickly discovers that's easier said than done(n)

programme.title: The Last Mimzy
programme.desc: An intergalactic package discovered on the beach holds a myriad of fantastic discoveries for siblings Noah and Emma Wilder in The Last Mimzy, studio head-turned-director Bob Shaye's wondrous sci-fi fantasy parable. The children stumble onto their discovery amid a trip to the family beach house, and find inside of the crate strange crystals that Emma levitates with her mind, as well as the Mimzy -- a stuffed bunny with a built-in supercomputer that advances its possessor's brain by great leaps and bounds by whispering into the person's ear. Meanwhile, via interaction with the box and its contents, Noah gains the ability to converse with spiders and instructs them to build miniature bridges. He also etches complex Tibetan mandalas, and somehow manages to black out half of Seattle. The children naturally keep these happenings (and the box) from their mom and dad (Joely Richardson and Timothy Hutton), but in time the kids set their sights higher and embark on correcting huge problems that cannot be missed. Rainn Wilson (The Office) co-stars as the children's hippie science teacher; New Age expert Bruce Joel Rubin (Ghost, Jacob's Ladder) and Toby Emmerich co-authored the script, adapting the 1943 short story Mimsy Were the Borogoves, by Lewis Padgett(n)

programme.title: Astro Boy

programme.title: Life with Mikey
programme.desc: Mikey used to be a child star. These days, he's just a talent scout looking for kids with prospects, until pint-sized Angie picks his pocket. Mikey hears her sob story and sees his ticket back to the big time. Family comedy(n)

programme.title: The Cell
programme.desc: In Tarsem Singh's psychological thriller, Jennifer Lopez plays a child psychiatrist who is part of a team that has developed a drug-induced method to literally get inside disturbed children's minds to help them. Then FBI agent Vince Vaughn asks for her help. Serial killer Vincent D'Onofrio is in custody but in a coma and unless she can unlock the secrets of his mind, an imprisoned girl will be his next victim in hours. Using visual techniques ranging from sci-fi influences to Bosch, Singh's audacious film is a stunning, chilling tour-de-force(n)

programme.desc: Wingmen. Bret asks for help from Jemaine and Dave with a romantic pursuit; Murray has second thoughts about making Greg a scapegoat(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson stars as a disgraced pharmacist who invents a potent new street drug in this cracking good action comedy. Jackson plays Elmo McElroy, a kilt-wearing chemical genius who ditches his drug-lord boss (Meat Loaf) and heads to Liverpool to broker a multi-million-dollar deal with an English criminal. But Mr. Loaf sends a hit woman after him(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson plays former cop John Shaft, the nephew of the '70s private eye of the same name, who takes on a racist killer and a Dominican drug lord. Slick but unfocused. Christian Bale. Richard Roundtree, the star of the 1971 original and two sequels, has a cameo. Other cameos include Gordon Parks, who directed the original film; and Isaac Hayes, who wrote the memorable theme song(n)

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl suffers through a forgotten 16th birthday, dealing with unrequited love and the unwanted attention of a nerd in this teen classic(n)

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: M Night Shyamalan's end-of-the-world thriller begins in New York City with an outbreak of inexplicable suicides, which rapidly starts to take on plague proportions. As the wave of self-destruction spreads, people do their best to escape whatever it is that's causing it. Among them are Philadelphia science teacher Elliot Moore (Mark Wahlberg) and his wife Alma (Zooey Deschanel), along with Mark's friend Julian (John Leguizamo) and his daughter Jess (Ashlyn Sanchez). Their initial plans to flee to the state capital don't work out, so they take off to the countryside, where they think they'll be safe. But it's not long before they discover that they may have made a bad choice..(n)

programme.title: Starter for 10

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: Four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process(n)

programme.desc: In this majestic action epic set during the Han dynasty, a Chinese commander joins forces with a Roman general to protect China's sovereignty from a power-hungry villain(n)

programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson plays former cop John Shaft, the nephew of the '70s private eye of the same name, who takes on a racist killer and a Dominican drug lord. Slick but unfocused. programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This re-imagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Christian Wolff (Ben Affleck) is a mathematical genius who works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations eager to hide their dirty money. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, Wolff agrees to help an accounting clerk at a robotics firm (Anna Kendrick) look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated. J.K. Simmons, Jon Bernthal, Jeffrey Tambor, and John Lithgow co-star in this thriller directed by Gavin O'Connor (Warrior, Pride and Glory)(n)

programme.title: Steel
programme.desc: A former military metallurgist teams up with a paralyzed cohort and his junkman uncle to create a dazzling new superhero to fight an evil army of gang members and their leader, a mad inventor of sophisticated weaponry. Basketball superstar Shaquille O'Neal headlines this kid-oriented comic book action-adventure(n)

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: Michael Haneke's American re-make of his 1997 German version loses none of the terror or horror in the translation. An all-American family - George, Ann and son Georgie - arrive at their summer cottage for a yachting holiday. Two polite young men, Paul and Peter introduce themselves as neighbours but suddenly and brutally instil a nihilistic, sadistic regime on the family, playing mind games and torturing them. Haneke famously makes the audience complicit to events, rewinding events, having Paul and Peter address the audience directly and making the violence happen off screen but having it still horribly audible in this claustrophobic nightmare(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: An Amish-style community lives in fear of unseen creatures in the woods, until one resident is forced to brave his phobia and venture into the forest. Horror/mystery(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind
programme.desc: Offbeat comedy about a video store employee and his hapless friend, who, after managing to wipe the films in the shop, must remake all the movies themselves. After being threatened with copyright violation by industry bigwigs, the duo are aided by the store's loyal customers in a bid to make a legitimate and original film about a local hero(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Rell (Jordan Peele) becomes attached to an adorable kitten named Keanu while dealing with a painful breakup. But when he returns home one night with his cousin Clarence (Keegan-Michael Key), he is devastated to learn that his house has been burglarized and his feline friend is missing. The nerdy duo attempt to find the culprits who took Keanu, and they eventually get in way over their heads as their search leads them to infiltrate a violent street gang. Peter Atencio directed this irreverent action comedy, which co-stars Method Man, Luis Guzman, Will Forte, and Nia Long(n)

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Jay Mohr and Lloyd Bridges (in his last role) star in this parody of the "Godfather" trilogy. The story centers on a powerful Mafia family, targeted by rivals who can't wait to see the aging Don (Bridges) and his potential successor out of the way of their glorious plans for the future of organized crime. Christina Applegate, Olympia Dukakis, Billy Burke, Pamela Gidley(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor
programme.desc: Rom-com starring Chris O'Donnell and 'Bridget Jones' star Renee Zellweger. A young man stands to inherit a vast fortune on his 30th birthday, provided that he is married(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: Oliver Stone takes on professional football, a sport whose grace and delicacy are a good match for his filmmaking style. Tony D'Amato (Al Pacino), the head coach of the Miami Sharks, won back-to-back championships four years ago. But new team owner Christina Pagniacci (Cameron Diaz) has little enthusiasm for the finer points of the game and is concerned only with the bottom line. The longtime strongman of Tony's team has been "Cap" Rooney (Dennis Quaid), a 39-year-old quarterback, but Christina balks at renewing his contract. When Cap is injured during a game, third-string rookie quarterback Willie Beaman (Jamie Foxx) goes on in his place and becomes a major star. But Beaman is mostly interested in fame and money, and he has little regard for Tony and his teammates. Any Given Sunday also stars James Woods as the team's doctor, LL Cool J as a star running back, Jim Brown as a former football great turned Sharks' defensive coordinator, Ann-Margret as Christina's alcoholic mother, Bill Bellamy as a wide receiver, Elizabeth Berkley as Tony's favorite prostitute, and Charlton Heston as the football commissioner(n)

programme.title: Bullet to the Head
programme.desc: A cop and a killer forge a shaky partnership to find out who killed their partners in this throwback buddy action flick starring Sylvester Stallone, and directed by vet Walter Hill. Battle-scarred New Orleans hitman James Bonomo (Stallone) and his longtime partner Louis (Jon Seda) have just executed their latest hit, a cop named Hank Greely (Holt McCallany) when Louis is killed by hulking enforcer Keegan (Jason Momoa) before they can get paid. In the wake of a failed attempt on Bonomo's life as well, Keegan flees the scene, but not before his intended target gets a good look at his face. Meanwhile, Korean NYPD cop Taylor Kwon (Sung Kang) shows up in town determined to find out who killed Greely, his former partner. When Kwon tracks Bonomo down to find out who hired him, both realize that their best hope for catching their respective partners' killers is to team up. Before long, their trail of clues has led them to sleazy lawyer Marcus Baptiste (Christian Slater), who is currently caught up in some shady business dealings with the mysterious and powerful Robert Nkomo Morel (Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje) that could implicate some serious power players in Washington, D.C. Now each new move that Bonomo and Kwon make could be their last, and as the cop does his best to stay on the right side of the law, the killer uses the only tactics he knows to get results. But even if they manage to get their man, that doesn't change the fact that they'll have to deal with one another once they've taken down their target(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A CIA assassin asks a former high-school classmate, now an accountant, for his help in saving the world(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: A buttoned-down career woman agrees to let a loopy working-class girl become the surrogate mother of her child(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Slick Hollywood fixer Eddie Mannix is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom by a mysterious group. Mannix races to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal(n)

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, bumbling private eye Holland March (Ryan Gosling) and muscle-for-hire Jackson Healy (Russell Crowe) become unlikely partners when they find themselves both looking for a missing woman named Amelia (Margaret Qualley) following the death of a high-profile porn star. Amelia's ties to the deceased actress are unclear, but as other members of the porn industry turn up dead, March and Healy's investigation reveals a much bigger conspiracy than the duo could have ever anticipated. With the help of March's teenage daughter Holly (Angourie Rice), their sleuthing eventually unearths corruption within the federal government. Shane Black (Iron Man 3) directed and co-wrote this action buddy comedy, which co-stars Kim Basinger and Matt Bomer(n)

programme.title: 15 Minutes
programme.desc: Cop Robert De Niro and arson investigator Edward Burns team up to investigate a double murder only to find the perpetrators are crazed Eastern European criminals. Karel Roden and Oleg Taktarov are convinced that if they videotape their crimes across the city, they'll be paid millions by TV producer Kelsey Grammer, who'll do anything to chase ratings in John Herzfeld's gritty thriller(n)

programme.title: Fall to Grace
programme.desc: In 2004, New Jersey governor Jim McGreevey was struggling with his public image and the political fallout from allegations of sexual harassment when he resigned from office after making a surprising revelation -- that he was "a Gay American" who was in a relationship with a man despite being married to a woman. McGreevey's marriage and political career were soon over, and outside of the public eye, he began following a different path. In the documentary Fall To Grace, filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi offers a look into the life of Jim McGreevey eight years after he left office: a man of renewed religious faith, he serves as a counselor, mentor, and spiritual advisor to the female prisoners at the Hudson County Correctional Center, and is in a stable, long-term relationship with another man as he strives to serve those who need help rather than chasing power and privilege. Fall Into Grace was produced for the HBO premium cable network, and received its world premiere at the 2013 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Director Christopher Nolan follows up his breakthrough sophomore film Memento with this remake of a stylish Norwegian thriller. Al Pacino stars as Detective Will Dormer, a Los Angeles Police Department legend who temporarily escapes an internal affairs investigation that may ruin his career by traveling to Nightmute, AK, the remote site of a murder that has the local authorities flummoxed. Along with his partner, Hap Eckhart (Martin Donovan), and the small town's wide-eyed rookie investigator, Ellie Burr (Hilary Swank), the exhausted Dormer probes the brutal slaying of a teenage girl who was rumored to have a secret lover. A clever ruse quickly lures the killer into a police trap, but the suspect escapes and a tragic accident at the scene leaves Dormer at the mercy of the murderer, a pulp crime novelist named Walter Finch (Robin Williams). As Finch plays a dangerous game of extortion with Dormer, the detective's mental health deteriorates rapidly from guilt over his complicity in a crime and sleep deprivation compounded by the lack of darkness in the land of the midnight sun. Meanwhile, the bright and dogged Ellie continues putting the pieces of a complex puzzle together despite Dormer's skillful attempts to lead the investigation toward the right suspect, but away from his own malfeasance. Insomnia co-stars Paul Dooley, Nicky Katt, Maura Tierney, and Jonathan Jackson(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Huntsman: Winter's War'
programme.desc: A look at "The Huntsman: Winter's War," a 2016 prequel to "Snow White and the Huntsman" that follows the Huntsman and his secret lover Sara as they attempt to stop Freya the Ice Queen and her evil sister from conquering the forest. The film stars Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron and Emily Blunt, and is directed by Cedric Nicolas-Troyan(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: One woman's rocky road to the altar gets played for laughs in this comedy, adapted from the one-woman off-Broadway show written by and starring Nia Vardalos. Toula (Vardalos) is a Greek-American woman who is in her early thirties and single, with no immediate prospects of changing that status any time soon. This bothers Toula a bit, but not half as much as it distresses her mother (Lainie Kazan) and father (Michael Constantine), who want to send her to Greece in hopes of finding a husband in the old country. Toula isn't interested in leaving the country to find a man, but since she works in the family business -- a Greek restaurant in Chicago called Dancing Zorba's -- she has to hear about it whether she likes it or not. One day, after seeing a handsome stranger in the restaurant and not having the courage to talk to him, Toula decides she needs a bit of self-improvement. Despite her dad's misgivings, Toula signs up for a night-school class studying computers, trades in her glasses for contact lenses, gets a different job at a travel agency, and spruces herself up with a new look and a new attitude. To her very pleasant surprise, she once again encounters the handsome stranger, who soon asks her out on a date. Schoolteacher Ian Miller (John Corbett) is seemingly perfect -- he's tall, handsome, smart, good-natured, and soon in love with Toula -- except for two little things: he's not Greek, and he's a vegetarian, both of which horrify Toula's family. When Ian pops the question (and Toula says yes), the bride-to-be has to negotiate a reasonably peaceful meeting between Ian's upper-class parents and her own working-class extended family. There's also the matter of the wedding, which Toula's mother is planning around the notion that quantity IS quality. My Big Fat Greek Wedding also features Ian Gomez (Vardalos' real-life husband), Louis Mandylor, Andrea Martin, and Joey Fatone (from the pop group *NSYNC). Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson helped produce the film through the auspices of their production company, Playtone(n)

programme.title: Bend It like Beckham
programme.desc: The comic tale of a young Asian woman who joins the local semi-professional football team but opts not to tell her traditionalist family, who want her to go to law school and settle down with a nice Indian boy. Finding it increasingly difficult to deal with her double life as a dutiful daughter and a talented footballer, her friendship with a fellow player and growing attraction for the coach soon cause repercussions for all concerned(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: 1992 blockbuster starring Whitney Houston and Kevin Costner - as a singer superstar and her bodyguard who fall in love. Houston hires Costner when she starts receiving death threats from a stalker. The ex-presidential bodyguard has a past, however. He is wracked by guilt over his inability to protect Reagan from John Hinckley's assassination attempt. He's certainly not going to let a bullet slip past himagain and the draconian security measures he sets up are a shock to Houston. But Costner proves his worth when, in the face of death threats, the singer gives the performance of her life at the Oscar ceremony. Houston brings the house down with her performance of the Dolly Parton song 'I Will Always Love You'(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds
programme.desc: Revenge of the Nerds is the juvenile sex comedy perhaps most synonymous with the 1980s, alternating gags and scantily clad women with a power to the underdogs mentality that prompted three sequels. The handsome jocks of Alpha Beta, led by Stan (Ted McGinley), run Adams College, which means that when they burn down their house after a stunt involving grain alcohol and an open flame, they kick a bunch of socially inept freshman out of their dorm and into the gymnasium. But sleeping on cots is only the beginning of their worries, as the so-called nerds soon become the target of pranks by Alpha Beta, assisted by Betty (Julie Montgomery) and the gorgeous gals of Pi Delta Pi. Instead of taking the abuse sitting down, the displaced freshman, led by Gilbert (Anthony Edwards) and Lewis (Robert Carradine), buy a ramshackle house, affiliate themselves with the only national chapter who will take them (the all-black Lambda Lambda Lambda), and use their superior intellect to launch a counterstrike. The bespectacled but loveable geeks set up surveillance cameras in the Pi bathroom and put liquid heat in the athletes' jock straps, then draft a sister sorority of misfits (Omega Mu) to strengthen their resources. The frats quickly become bitter rivals, and the goal is to win the annual fraternity decathlon, which involves such feats as a burping contest and a go-cart race, with bragging rights (and perhaps peace of mind) at stake. Look for John Goodman and future thirtysomething cast member Timothy Busfield in small roles, and expect a torrent of nasal laughter(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds II: Nerds in Paradise

programme.desc: Another fun comedy for the Jim Carrey fans, 'Liar Liar' brings the star as Fletcher Reed, a successful lawyer who has built his career by lying. A divorced father, Fletcher has always given precedence to his job until on his son's eight birthday party ' that he had sworn he would attend -, Fletcher makes up such a lame excuse that when it comes time to blow out the candles, the boy makes a wish: that his dad could go just one day without telling a lie. The wish comes true but Fletcher's new compulsion for only saying the truth will make his next day in court very interesting(n)

The host nation will see this tournament as ideal preparation for next summer's World Cup, for which they also qualify automatically as hosts, while New Zealand are appearing in this competition having won the OFC Nations Cup last year. programme.sub-title: Britain's Best Walks with Julia Bradbury: Lakeside Walk: Loch Lomond, Scotland.
programme.desc: The presenter heads to Loch Lomond, a freshwater Scottish loch famously celebrated in song that crosses the Highland Boundary Fault and is the largest inland stretch of water in Great Britain by surface area. Taking in the popular West Highland way, it's just a quick boat ride to the idyllic island of Inchailloch, a jewel in the loch's crown, where stunning views over the immense mass of water can be enjoyed.(n)

programme.desc: A fisherman's body is found tangled up in a North Sea trawler's net. Vera and her team investigate with the help of the local harbourmaster, and find the dead man's sons pointing the finger at the owner of a fish market, with whom they have a long-running feud. Retracing the dead man's steps, Vera discovers when he drowned and tracks down a waitress who may have been one of the last people to see him alive. However, the case becomes more complicated when a witness runs away and a boat belonging to the dead man's sister-in-law goes up in flames.(n)

programme.title: The Loch
programme.desc: A human heart is discovered on the shores of the Loch, and forensic psychologist Blake Albrighton is brought in to join the investigating team. He quickly forms a disturbing theory about the motive behind the seemingly inexplicable murders, but Chief Inspector Frank Smilie is quick to dismiss his ideas. However, if the new arrival is correct, the once peaceful Highland community could be set to endure far more deaths, as a serial killer prowls the area. Meanwhile, Riggs begins to view Agent Palmer in a new light, while Murtaugh is left worried after Trish makes a spontaneous decision.
