programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Spread
programme.desc: An unemployed drifter gets by living off a succession of wealthy older lovers, the latest of whom is a successful Los Angeles attorney. However, his carefree existence takes an unexpected turn when he falls in love with an equally directionless waitress(n)

programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A marine, fresh out of boot camp, returns home for Thanksgiving before being sent to Iraq. He faces family strife, while dealing with a budding relationship and animosity from jealous friends(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings (Haruka Ayase, Masami Nagasawa, and Kaho) learn that they have a teenage half sister (Suzu Hirose), and invite her to live with them in the seaside town of Kamakura. In time, her presence forces them to reflect on their own lives and family ties. Written and directed by Hirokazu Koreeda, Our Little Sister is based on the Japanese comic series Umimachi Diary by Akimi Yoshida(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: One of the most commercially successful British films of all time stars Hugh Grant, Andie Macdowell, Kristin Scott Thomas, Simon Callow and Rowan Atkinson, in a tale of 8 friends, 5 priests, 11 wedding dresses, 16 parents-in-law, 2,000 champagne glasses and two people who belong together but insist on staying apart. Director: Mike Newell. (1993)(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: In this comedy-drama set in the 1970s, a bipolar man promises his estranged wife that he will care for their two young daughters while she attends business school in New York(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialise in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings (Haruka Ayase, Masami Nagasawa, and Kaho) learn that they have a teenage half sister (Suzu Hirose), and invite her to live with them in the seaside town of Kamakura. In time, her presence forces them to reflect on their own lives and family ties. Written and directed by Hirokazu Koreeda, Our Little Sister is based on the Japanese comic series Umimachi Diary by Akimi Yoshida(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow (Rebecca Hall) of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist (Jason Sudeikis) who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing. Directed by Sean Mewshaw(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: Best Actress nominee Julianne Moore stars in writer-director Todd Haynes' sumptuous homage to the melodramas of the 1950s. Moore is superb as an affluent wife and mother whose picture-perfect world is shattered by a shocking discovery about her husband (Dennis Quaid) and a forbidden love affair. Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson, James Rebhorn, Viola Davis(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Woman
programme.desc: An actress wrestles with feelings of guilt and remorse following an affair with Charles Dickens(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: In this comedy-drama set in the 1970s, a bipolar man promises his estranged wife that he will care for their two young daughters while she attends business school in New York(n)

programme.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
programme.desc: Strip club owner Larry Flynt and his wife, Althea, create a pornographic magazine that ignores society's morals and taboos. "Hustler" magazine brings the Flynts not only millions in profit but also the wrath of "decent" people. Flynt and his overburdened attorney find themselves in courtrooms all over the nation defending Larry against criminal and civil charges. In the meantime, Flynt is beset by paralysis, the result of an assassination attempt, drug addiction, mental illness, and Althea's failing health(n)

programme.title: Tristan & Isolde
programme.desc: Prosaic retelling of the legendary folktale about the star-crossed love affair of an English warrior and an Irish princess in war-torn medieval Britain(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: A Roman soldier is tasked to investigate the rumours of a Jew who has risen from the dead, who is known as Yeshua, or Jesus Christ(n)

programme.title: Rudderless
programme.desc: A grieving father performs his late son's songs in order to keep his spirit alive in this deeply affecting musical drama. Later, the father and a young musician form a band that transforms their lives in ways neither dreamed possible(n)

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An idealistic FBI agent (Daniel Radcliffe) goes deep undercover within a white-supremacy group in order to bring down the organization from the inside. Daniel Ragussis directed this crime thriller, which co-stars Toni Collette and Tracy Letts(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: A student from 1960's Beijing discovers a common ground between himself and the animals he lives beside in this period drama from director Jean-Jacques Annaud. After being sent to Mongolia to live with a group of herdsmen, Chen Zhen (Feng Shaofeng) develops an affection for a group of wolves who he comes to see as equals, and attempts to adopt and raise an endangered cub(n)

programme.title: The Eagle Huntress
programme.desc: A 13-year-old Mongolian girl named Aisholpan Nurgaiv strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders. Directed by Otto Bell(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: A Roman soldier is tasked to investigate the rumours of a Jew who has risen from the dead, who is known as Yeshua, or Jesus Christ(n)

programme.title: Smart People
programme.desc: For the first time since his wife's death, an arrogant English professor takes a shot at romance---with a former student. His protective 17-year-old daughter disapproves(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake is left to raise his daughter, Katie, on his own after his wife dies in a car accident and he suffers a mental breakdown. He struggles with daily routines and his relatives intend to take Katie away, but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: After a shady deal costs him his business, sixty- something womaniser Ben Kalmen's life begin to unravel(n)

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: Gruesome horror comedy about a pot-smoking teen slacker (Devon Sawa) who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade in this wild horror comedy. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: Spunky martial artist Elizabeth Bennet and wealthy zombie killer Mr. Darcy fall in love despite their class differences while battling an undead uprising in 19th-century England(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: Warm, nostalgic comedy drama depicting a college band's rise to stardom in the 1960s. After a successful talent show appearance, The Wonders are snapped up by a record company and given their own manager. Setting off on a nationwide tour to promote their first single, 'That Thing You Do!', they encounter all the trappings - and some of the drawbacks - of fame(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens ask the unemployed actors of a cancelled science-fiction series to help them win an intergalactic war in this comedy(n)

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: A neurotic, twice divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mom to solve his personal problems(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: Summer School
programme.desc: A gym teacher is conned into handling a remedial English class in exchange for a Hawaiian vacation(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: Spunky martial artist Elizabeth Bennet and wealthy zombie killer Mr. Darcy fall in love despite their class differences while battling an undead uprising in 19th-century England(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Both laughs and thrills are on the masthead in this comedy drama about a would-be reporter written and directed by Woody Allen. Sondra Pransky (Scarlett Johansson) is an American journalism student who travels to England to visit friends. While in London, she attends a magic show where magician Sid "Splendini" Waterman (Woody Allen) brings her on-stage as part of a trick in which he makes her disappear. However, while waiting to be "de-materialized," she's visited by the ghost of a murdered reporter (Ian McShane), who passes along the scoop of the decade. The spirit claims that Peter Lyman (Hugh Jackman), the wealthy and handsome son of a well-known aristocrat, is leading a double life as "the Tarot Card Killer," a serial murderer who has been terrifying the nation and eluding police. With the magician's help, Jane begins investigating the story and is able to piece together some incriminating evidence against Lyman. However, the more she learns, the more dangerous her investigation becomes -- especially when she falls into a romance with the suspected killer. Scoop was Woody Allen's second consecutive film with leading lady Scarlett Johansson, after the critically acclaimed Match Point; it was also Allen's second feature to be shot in Great Britain(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: The work of international superstar Stephen Chow, Kung Fu Hustle is a humorous, special-effects-filled, action-packed martial arts epic set in early '40s China. A bumbling thief named Sing (Stephen Chow) desires to be the toughest member of the dreaded gangster hit squad known as The Axe Gang, but to completely join the gang he has to commit murder. When Sing attempts to rob a crowded run-down apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, the locals begin to defend themselves with some high-flying kung fu skills, and a tiny war erupts between the local masters and the axe-wielding gang. After the gang busts the ancient kung fu king known as The Beast (Leung Siu Lung) out of jail, tensions reach a boiling point as Pig Sty Alley's landlady (Yuen Qiu) leads an all-out attack against the gang and Sing discovers his true heroic fate. Kung Fu Hustle, which set box-office records across Asia during its December 2004 release, also stars Yuen Wah and Xing Yu, and features fight choreography by legendary masters of martial arts cinema Yuen Woo Ping and Sammo Hung(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: Spunky martial artist Elizabeth Bennet and wealthy zombie killer Mr. Darcy fall in love despite their class differences while battling an undead uprising in 19th-century England(n)

programme.title: A Smile like Yours
programme.desc: An understanding couple try their best to conceive a child(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: Darkly comic drama about a journalist who dishes out advice to newspaper readers through a daily column in which he talks about his struggles with his life and his three children. However, when he falls in love with his brother's new girlfriend, he begins to lose his grip on his complicated life(n)

programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: A self-reliant orphan in 16th-century France is disliked by her stepmother but adored by a prince in this progressive update of the classic fairy tale(n)

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: There's no need to fear Underdog is here! And what a dog-gone treat. The canine superhero (voice of Jason Lee) protects his city against the evil machinations of mad scientist Simon Barsinister (Peter Dinklage) in this action-packed thrill ride based on the cartoon series from the 1960s. Patrick Warburton is a hoot as Simon's henchman Cad. Amy Adams provides the voice of Underdog's love interest Sweet Polly Purebred. Directed by Frederik Du Chau. James Belushi Alex Neuberger(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Steins
programme.desc: A Hollywood agent plans an extravagant bar mitzvah in Dodger Stadium to top a celebration thrown by his bitter rival. Jeremy Piven ("Entourage") stars in this warm and funny family comedy. Jami Gertz, Daryl Hannah, Garry Marshall, Doris Roberts, Daryl Sabara. Directed by Scott Marshall(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: Darkly comic drama about a journalist who dishes out advice to newspaper readers through a daily column in which he talks about his struggles with his life and his three children. However, when he falls in love with his brother's new girlfriend, he begins to lose his grip on his complicated life(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Having never fully recovered from a prom date that became a total disaster, Ted finally gets a chance to reunite with his old prom date Mary, only to run up against other suitors including the sleazy detective he hired to find her(n)

programme.title: Father of Invention
programme.desc: An entrepreneur with a world-class ego has to rebuild his empire and his family relationships from scratch in this comedy. Robert Axle (Kevin Spacey) built a multi-million-dollar business out of selling household gadgets through television infomercials, and managed to alienate nearly everyone around him when fame and wealth turned him into an arrogant loudmouth. When one of Axle's products turns out to be dangerous and causes several thousand customers to lose a finger, he loses his fortune and spends eight years in prison for gross negligence. Back on the street, Axle is broke but determined to find a way back to the top, though he's just a bit more humble than he used to be and wants to win back the love of his daughter, Claire (Camilla Belle), whom he neglected as a child, and his ex-wife (Virginia Madsen). Things go badly for Axle on his first day working at a big-box discount store, and he's left with little alternative than to ask Claire to let him stay with her; she and her roommate, Fibbi (Heather Graham), aren't so sure this is a good idea, but they grudgingly agree and end up helping Axle in his bid to redeem himself. Father of Invention also stars Johnny Knoxville, Craig Robinson, and Michael Rosenbaum(n)

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Warmly humorous update of the Cyrano de Bergerac story, starring Steve Martin and Daryl Hannah. The grotesquely long-nosed fire chief of a small American town is in love with a beautiful astronomer - though she has eyes only for a dull but handsome visiting fireman. The chief is too ashamed of his appearance to make advances himself, but is drawn into assisting his rival from behind the scenes(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: Darkly comic drama about a journalist who dishes out advice to newspaper readers through a daily column in which he talks about his struggles with his life and his three children. However, when he falls in love with his brother's new girlfriend, he begins to lose his grip on his complicated life(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Having never fully recovered from a prom date that became a total disaster, Ted finally gets a chance to reunite with his old prom date Mary, only to run up against other suitors including the sleazy detective he hired to find her(n)

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: Locals and tourists in Rome find their lives intersecting. An architect tries to recapture his youth; an ordinary guy unexpectedly becomes famous; a couple are torn apart by new love interests; an opera director tries to get a mortician to sing on stage(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally(n)

programme.title: Operation: Endgame
programme.desc: A satirical workplace comedy with a slick action twist, Fouad Mikati's Operation: Endgame explores the violence that erupts when the organization charged with protecting America implodes, and the employees turn their guns on each other instead of their enemies. Somewhere beneath Washington, D.C., an intense rivalry is heating up between two opposing teams of government assassins. The hired killers in the organizations take their names from Tarot cards. The Fool (Joe Anderson) is the latest recruit. Reporting for his first day on the job, The Fool is shocked to find that his boss is dead, and the office is on lockdown. To make matters worse, the building has been rigged with explosives, and it's going to blow soon. Now, in order to get out alive, The Fool will have to root out the killer in his midst, and make a quick escape before his co-workers catch him in their crosshairs. Ellen Barkin, Zach Galifianakis, Rob Corddry, and Jeffrey Tambor star(n)

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Box-office hit about the basic training of a Navy pilot(n)

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Irish psychological drama. A teenage boy becomes suicidal after the death of his alcoholic father, and drives a stolen car over the edge of a cliff. Surviving, he is sent to a mental institution, where he makes a friend and falls in love with a girl as he comes to terms with his feelings(n)

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: Langston Whitfield is an African-American journalist who is assigned to cover the South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission hearings by The Washington Post; Whitfield doubts the efficacy of this process, and sets out to interview Col. De Jager, a notorious former officer of the South African police who was famous for his violence against blacks, in order to put this method to the test(n)

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Frank Military and Susan Rhinehart scripted this western, a look back at the post-Civil War Black cavalry troops known as the Buffalo Soldiers, the fierce fighting unit previously covered in a PBS four-parter (1970) and an NBC pilot (1979). In the New Mexico Territory, ex-slave Sgt. Wyatt (Danny Glover) and the Buffalo soldiers arrest Captain Draper (Robert Knott) and other Texas Rangers, but politics mean the Rangers are quietly freed later. Back at Fort Craig, Wyatt reports to anti-black General Pike (Tom Bower) and Col. Grierson (Bob Gunton), a white responsible for assembling and supporting the black regiment. A search is underway for Indian chief Victorio (Harrison Lowe). Indian prophet Nana (Chesley Wilson) is tortured in an effort to get him to reveal Victorio's whereabouts. Determining that Victorio is at Rattlesnake Springs, the Buffalo Soldiers head in that direction for a confrontation. Filmed in the desert of Arizona's Cochise County, Buffalo Soldiers premiered December 7, 1997 on TNT(n)

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Veteran cops Rooster and Turk are called in to investigate a series of vigilante murders, but it's not long before they both fall under suspicion(n)

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: A car accident and shifting affections test the bond between a married couple(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror in this spine-tingling thriller when Lisa, a sexy office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely(n)

programme.title: The Glass Shield
programme.desc: A young ambitious black cop joins an all-white police department and struggles to hold his own and restore justice as racial tensions run high(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels producer Matthew Vaughn kicked off his directorial career with this crime thriller starring Daniel Craig, Sienna Miller and Michael Gambon. Craig plays an unnamed gentleman drug dealer (well, all things are relative in his line of work) who, landed with an astonishingly lucrative job, spies his opportunity to retire relatively unscathed from the business. However, before he can do so, his boss Jimmy Price asks him to track down the missing daughter of another gangster, Eddie Temple, and as Temple's of an even nastier temperament than Price it's not a request he can easily refuse. And once he embarks on his task, complications begin to stack upon each other in much the manner of the confection that gives the film its title - though rather than some lovely sponge, cream and berries, this one consists of brutal henchmen, drug deals gone bad and violent bloodletting(n)

programme.desc: In this deeply inspiring religious drama based on a true story, a 10-year-old girl is somehow cured of a chronic digestive disorder following a serious accident in which she falls three stories. Soon, her mother believes that her recovery is a miracle(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Bobby Bowfinger, a would-be movie producer and charlatan who desperately needs a hit film to repay his debts. Bringing together a cast of oddballs, he dupes superstar actor Eddie Murphy into starring in his low-budget picture. Sharp comedy, with an experienced cast including Heather Graham(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy plays Chandler Jarrell, a private eye specialising in missing child cases who is called in when sinister agents kidnap the eponymous, world-saving Golden Child from a Tibetan temple. His search takes him through countless adventures and escapades, as well as a romantic dalliance with the mysterious Kee Nang in Michael Ritchie's all-action comedy movie. The sleuth's search for the Golden Child takes him through countless adventures and escapades, as well as a romantic dalliance with the mysterious Kee Nang(n)

programme.desc: After moving to Florida, an Iowa teen gets mixed up in an underground fighting league and is mentored by a mixed-martial-arts master in this derivative and cliché-ridden story(n)

programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit in this high-octane superhero flick. Donning the technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention(n)

programme.desc: The walls of time and space break down in this rollicking sci-fi adventure, in which an ambitious teen discovers a pin that transports her to a futuristic world. She then teams up with a jaded genius, and they embark on a mission to save the Earth(n)

programme.title: The Dolphin: Story of a Dreamer
programme.desc: This animated release for kids follows the story of Daniel Alexander, a dolphin whose dreams and aspirations go far beyond the aquatic world he lives in. Courageous and brave, Daniel leaves the confines of his pod and embarks on a fun adventure with his friends, learning important lessons about happiness and self-confidence along the way(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: An orphan who dreams of someday finding a family to call his own finds his fate taking an unexpected turn when a mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson transports him into the future. Based on the book A Day With Wilbur Robinson by William Joyce, Meet the Robinsons tells the story of a boy with a lifelong wish to belong, and shows what happens when he meets an incredible collection of characters who just might have the power to make his wildest fantasies come true. The film's all-star cast of vocal contributors -- including Angela Bassett, Kelly Ripa, Tom Selleck, Adam West, Steve Zahn, and Laurie Metcalf -- brings the world of the future to life as never before seen on the silver screen(n)

programme.desc: The third entry in the series is another song-and-dance extravaganza that sees the gang being faced with important life decisions regarding their futures(n)

programme.desc: Manny, Sid and Diego are back in this rollicking animated adventure. This time, the trio flee their melting homeland and meet a female mammoth who thinks she's a possum(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: An orphan who dreams of someday finding a family to call his own finds his fate taking an unexpected turn when a mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson transports him into the future. Based on the book A Day With Wilbur Robinson by William Joyce, Meet the Robinsons tells the story of a boy with a lifelong wish to belong, and shows what happens when he meets an incredible collection of characters who just might have the power to make his wildest fantasies come true. The film's all-star cast of vocal contributors -- including Angela Bassett, Kelly Ripa, Tom Selleck, Adam West, Steve Zahn, and Laurie Metcalf -- brings the world of the future to life as never before seen on the silver screen(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit in this high-octane superhero flick. Donning the technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: The Grim Reaper comes to Earth to retrieve a media tycoon shortly before his 65th birthday, but agrees to grant him a little more time if the mogul will teach him about life's pleasures. The doomed man jumps at the chance, but doesn't foresee that Death will fall in love with his beautiful daughter(n)

programme.title: Madeline Sing Along: Madeline and Her Friends
programme.desc: The French schoolgirl from the beloved children's stories sings songs with her pals(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: A supercharged business executive finds her life changing dramatically when she inherits a year-old baby from a cousin. Too busy at work to raise a child, she is traumatised by nappies, baby food and an increasingly distant husband. Eventually forced to resign, she takes off to a country farmhouse, where she discovers her real feelings. An amiable comedy which fires a well-aimed broadside at the 80s yuppie lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: An old fashioned romance which begins when a widower's young son tells a radio pone in show that his dad needs a new wife. The broadcast is heard by countless eligible women who write to him via the programme, but the youngster realises that one of them is Miss right. Now his matchmaking abilities are tested to the full - the girl lives on the other side of America and by now dad is dating someone else(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: The jumbo-sized Baker family are back in this sequel to the 2003 box-office hit Cheaper by the Dozen. College football coach Tom Baker (Steve Martin) and his wife, author Kate Baker (Bonnie Hunt), have decided its time they took their sizable brood of 12 children on a summer vacation, and so they pack up the cars and take the kids to Lake Winnetka for some camping. Not all the kids are happy about this, but the one who is really annoyed turns out to be Tom, who discovers his old rival Jimmy Murtaugh (Eugene Levy) is also staying near the lake. Jimmy and his trophy wife, Sarina (Carmen Electra), also have a large family of eight children, and Jimmy and Tom seem intent upon one-upping each other at every opportunity. As the tensions mount, the Baker family and the Murtaugh clan face off in a not-so-good-natured series of family games to determine which of the parents have the greater bragging rights. In addition to Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt, the actors playing the 12 Baker children from the 2003 film return for Cheaper by the Dozen 2, including Hilary Duff, Piper Perabo, Tom Welling, and Kevin Schmidt(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: Manny, Sid and Diego are back in this rollicking animated adventure. This time, the trio flee their melting homeland and meet a female mammoth who thinks she's a possum(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as Howard Langston, workaholic dad to Jamie. All Jamie wants for Christmas is the must-have toy Turbo Man but it's Christmas Eve and it's sold out everywhere. As Howard sets out on a quest to find one, he's joined by rival Myron Larabee and the two battle it out as they search high and low for the toy. Meanwhile, back home, Howard's increasingly disillusioned wife Liz becomes the object of desire of neighbour Ted Maltin in Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy(n)

programme.title: The Black Stallion
programme.desc: Teri Garr and Mickey Rooney star in this heartwarming adventure about a boy who forges a special friendship with a wild stallion after both are shipwrecked on a deserted island(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a little girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco in this Pixar adventure from director Pete Docter (Up, Monsters Inc.). Young Riley was perfectly content with her life when her father landed a new job in San Francisco, and the family moved across the country. Now, as Riley prepares to navigate a new city and attend a new school, her emotional headquarters becomes a hot bed of activity. As Joy (voice of Amy Poehler) attempts to keep Riley feeling happy and positive about the move, other emotions like Fear (voice of Bill Hader), Anger (voice of Lewis Black), Disgust (voice of Mindy Kaling) and Sadness (Phyllis Smith) make the transition a bit more complicated(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Static. Dean Jagger stars as Ed Lindsay, a cranky middle-aged man living in a boarding house with several other old-timers, including his former fiancée Vinnie Brown (Carmen Mathews). Fed up with television, Ed squirrels himself away in his room, where he begins tooling around with the antique radio he's found in the cellar. Before long, he is receiving broadcasts from the 1930s and 1940s -- live broadcasts, not reruns. Having opened a window to the past, Ed desperately tries to correct several mistakes he's made in life. Scripted by Charles Beaumont from a story by OCee Ritch, "Static" was one of six videotaped Twilight Zone episodes and was originally telecast March 10, 1961 (and yes, that voice emanating from Ed's old-time radio does belong to future Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane)(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: Do we control our destiny, or do unseen forces manipulate us? Matt Damon stars in the thriller The Adjustment Bureau as a man who glimpses the future Fate has planned for him and realizes he wants something else. To get it, he must pursue the only woman he¿s ever loved across, under and through the streets of modern-day New York. On the brink of winning a seat in the U.S. Senate, ambitious politician David Norris (Damon) meets beautiful contemporary ballet dancer Elise Sellas (Emily Blunt)¿a woman like none he¿s ever known. But just as he realizes he¿s falling for her, mysterious men conspire to keep the two apart. David learns he is up against the agents of Fate itself¿the men of The Adjustment Bureau¿who will do everything in their considerable power to prevent David and Elise from being together. In the face of overwhelming odds, he must either let her go and accept a predetermined path¿or risk everything to defy Fate and be with her(n)

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: The Joes reteam to prevent Cobra from achieving total world domination in this sequel that picks up shortly after the events of G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra. The Nanomite threat has been neutralized, and the U.S. government has imprisoned Cobra Commander and Destro in an inescapable subterranean prison. When the leader of Pakistan is assassinated, the U.S. president (Jonathan Pryce) calls on the Joes to secure Pakistan's nuclear warheads before they fall into enemy hands. In the wake of successfully completing their mission, however, the Joes are decimated in a devastating surprise attack. When the smoke clears, Roadblock (Dwayne Johnson), Lady Jaye (Adrianne Palicki), and Flint (D.J. Cotrona) are the sole survivors. They're convinced that something is amiss in the White House, and as Lady Jaye theorizes that an imposter is pretending to be the commander in chief, bad guys Storm Shadow (Lee Byung-hun) and Firefly (Ray Stevenson) team up to break Cobra Commander (Luke Bracey) out of prison. Later, as Storm Shadow retreats into the mountains to recover from burns incurred in the extraction, Snake Eyes (Ray Park) and Jinx (Elodie Yung) manage to capture the elusive white ninja, in the process discovering a shocking secret about his past and learning that Zartan (Arnold Vosloo), posing as the president, has called an international summit to discuss nuclear disarmament in order to bring the leaders of the world to their knees before the diabolical Cobra Commander. Now, as Cobra holds the entire globe hostage with a revolutionary new weapon placed on satellites orbiting the planet, it's up to the Joes and a trustworthy old friend to save the day(n)

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A slave has an affair with his master's daughter as Mount Vesuvius prepares to erupt in AD 79(n)

programme.title: Wrecked

She meets three single guys who have an open room in their loft, and tries to convince them that she's the new roommate they're looking for(n)

programme.desc: Mia Famiglia. Ray helps Ally with a school project on family history(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Marie's Meatballs. It's a recipe for disaster when Ray asks his mother (Doris Roberts) to teach Debra (Patricia Heaton) to cook meatballs her way. Robert: Brad Garrett. Frank: Peter Boyle(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Heels on Wheels. Kelly counters her fading-youth crisis with a motorcycle, which Peg deems too dangerous, until she tries it(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Mr. Empty Pants. In a VERY SPECIAL Valentine's Day show, Peg (Katey Sagal) achieves fame by publishing a cartoon of Al (Ed O'Neill) in a magazine. At first upset over being identified as "Mr. Empty Pants", Al is soon basking in the popularity commensurate with being an overnight sex symbol--and even agrees to pose in a Tarzan outfit on a bearskin rug. In addition to a cute reference to the "other" Fox network hit The Simpsons, this episode features a solo appearance by Swedish Bikini Team member Avalon Anders(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour
programme.desc: East meets west when Jackie Chan teams up with the fast talking Chris Tucker as the pair hunt down the kidnapped daughter of a Chinese diplomat on American soil. Action comedy from Brett Ratner(n)

programme.title: Money Talks
programme.desc: Action and fast talking comedy abounds as motormouth Chris Tucker stars alongside Charlie Sheen as an escaped convict being chased by the police and a gang of diamond thieves. Franklin Hatchett is a small-time con man exposed by investigative reporter James Russell . When Hatchett becomes unwittingly involved in a jail break, the police think the escape was his idea. Not knowing where to hide, he calls the reporter and makes a deal: he will provide Russell with the exclusive story when he turns himself in, providing that Russell shelters him for the weekend. With a plan so simple, what could possibly go wrong?(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence and Will Smith return as odd-couple, wisecracking Miami cops in this action-packed sequel to 1995's "Bad Boys." This time, Burnett (Lawrence) and Lowrey (Smith) try to stop the flow of Ecstasy into the city by taking on a drug bigwig from Cuba. Meanwhile, love blossoms between Lowrey and Burnett's sister---a romance that Lowrey tries to hide from his partner. Jordi Molla(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with the Vows. With only two weeks to go before their wedding, Monica (Courteney Cox) and Chandler (Matthew Perry) step up their efforts to hit upon the "perfect vows" for the ceremony. Not surprisingly, the rest of the friends have several suggestions of their own. All of this leads to fond memories of Monica and Chandler's romantic past; in other words, "The One With the Vows" is a clip show, chock-full of highlights from previous Friends episodes(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Chandler's Dad. Monica drags Chandler to see his much mentioned, but never-before-seen, cross-dressing dad in his Vegas cabaret act; Ross rides shotgun for Rachel's less-than-joyful joyride in Monica's Porsche; Joey discovers the pleasure of wearing women's underwear(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding
programme.desc: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding. Part 1 of two. On the eve of Chandler and Monica's big day, the groom vanishes and the girls discover a shocking secret about the bride-to-be. Meanwhile, Joey fears he may not make the ceremony after getting stuck while filming a movie with a famous, slightly drunk actor (Gary Oldman). Helena: Kathleen Turner. Nora: Morgan Fairchild. Judy: Christina Pickles. Jack: Elliott Gould(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding
programme.desc: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding. Conclusion. Chandler learns of Monica's big news before she walks down the aisle, while Joey's intoxicated costar keeps him from getting to the church on time(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One After 'I Do'. Rachel reveals a bit of baby news at Monica's reception, while Chandler tries---and fails---to dance in rented shoes. Also, Ross gets stuck at the kids table after trying to impress his sister's sexy co-worker; and Joey uses his best-man speech as an audition for a director on the guest list(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Red Sweater
programme.desc: The One with the Red Sweater. Friends co-star David Schwimmer (Ross) directed this episode, in which the father of Rachel's baby is finally identified -- or is he? Crucial to the plotline is a red sweater, left behind by the "mystery man." Joey (Matt LeBlanc) shows the sweater to Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow), who, convinced that the mystery is solved, arranges an "accidental" meeting between Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) and the sweater's owner. Meanwhile, Joey goes off on the wrong track when he thinks that it is Phoebe who is pregnant; an anxious Monica (Courteney Cox) considers breaking her promise to Chandler (Matthew Perry) about waiting to open their wedding presents; and Chandler and Ross try to cover up the fact that they've lost all the wedding pictures(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One Where Rachel Tells... As Rachel sets off to tell her baby's father that he's going to be a daddy, the new Bings hit a dead end trying to get to their honeymoon. Treeger: Mike Hagerty. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Ross: David Schwimmer(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with the Videotape. Monica (Courteney Cox) and Chandler (Matthew Perry) have quite a story to tell about the fun couple they met during the trip back from their honeymoon. They also have the phone number of their new "friends"...or do they? Elsewhere, Ross (David Schwimmer) has indisputable proof that he is the father of Rachel's baby -- and it's all on videotape. And perhaps, at last, will come the answer to a burning question: did Ross hit on Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) or was it the other way around?(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And You Bet Your Ass. Caroline meets with studio writers in an effort to make her life story into a film, but she is torn when they reveal they would not portray Max in the project(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Great Escape. Max and Caroline lose Randy's dog while pet-sitting and risk their lives to find him, while a cannibalistic serial killer is loose in their neighborhood(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Werewolf Transformation. Sheldon's well-organised world is turned upside down when he learns that the barber who has cut his hair for years has passed away. As his orderly routines descend into chaos, he is forced to act like a hippy in order to match his shaggy new hairstyle. Meanwhile, Howard is sent to Houston for the gruelling NASA training programme and shares horrific stories about his experiences with Bernadette via Skype(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Weekend Vortex. Amy gets upset with Sheldon when he breaks his promise to accompany her to her aunt's birthday party and instead opts to join the guys for a Star Wars video game marathon lasting the entire weekend. Later, Penny convinces Amy that she should confront Sheldon about the matter and demand an apology(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Transporter Malfunction. Raj may have found his soulmate after his parents set him up on a date. Meanwhile, Sheldon thinks he's going out of his mind when he begins hearing the voice of Spock after he breaks Leonard's "Star Trek" collectible(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hawking Excitation. Sheldon is in seventh heaven and prepared to do whatever it takes to meet his science idol Stephen Hawking, who is working on a project with Howard(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Launch Acceleration. When NASA reschedules the launch of Howard's mission, the countdown to his wedding with Bernadette is put on hold, leaving him to deal with an irate father of the bride. Meanwhile, Leonard's pillow talk with Penny leaves her steaming(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Countdown Reflection. In the last episode of season five, Bernadette decides that she wants to be married to Wolowitz before his NASA space mission takes place. They scramble to organise a wedding ceremony at City Hall in the short time available, but their plans go awry. Can their friends step in to find an ordained minister and a romantic wedding venue before it's too late? All is revealed as the gang gather round the TV to watch the Space Shuttle, with Wolowitz on board, preparing to launch..(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Date Night Variable. Series 6 blasts off with Wolowitz in space, and despite that, he still has to intervene in an earthbound argument between his mother and Bernadette. Meanwhile, all Raj's friends are on dates, leaving him to ponder a solution to his loneliness(n)

programme.title: Claws
programme.desc: Tirana. Desna (Niecy Nash) gets entangled in a money-laundering scheme in the series premiere of this dark comedy centering on five hardworking yet treacherous manicurists at a Florida nail salon(n)

programme.title: Full Frontal With Samantha Bee
programme.desc: June 14, 2017. A late-night comedy show starring Samantha Bee(n)

programme.title: Angie Tribeca
programme.desc: Go Get 'Em Tiger. Dr. Scholls goes missing in the Season 3 finale. Also: A serial killer is still on the loose; and Lt. Atkins has an outdoor wedding(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Brainy adventurer Flynn Carsen (Noah Wyle) joins forces with a spunky archaeologist (Gabrielle Anwar) for a sweeping, globe-trotting quest to uncover the ancient treasures of the fabled mines of King Solomon. Along the way, Carsen unearths deep secrets about his family. A sequel to 2004's "The Librarian: Quest for the Spear," the film was directed by Jonathan Frakes, produced by Wyle and coexecutive produced by Dean Devlin(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Curse Of The Judas Chalice
programme.desc: Bookish brainiac Flynn Carsen (Noah Wyle) teams up with a New Orleans jazz singer (Stana Katic) to rescue a kidnapped scientist (Bruce Davison) and protect a sacred chalice, thereby foiling a plot that would give new life to a notorious vampire. The third installment in the "Librarian" cable-movie franchise, directed by Jonathan Frakes(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: You Can't Miss. Bud appears on a dating-game show called "You Can't Miss", but the show's never had a Bundy as a contestant(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Peggy and the Pirates. In this elaborate musical fantasy, Peg (Katey Sagal) dreams that she is Princess Scarlet, the captive of fierce pirate Captain Courage, who bears a striking resemblance to Peg's husband Al (Ed O'Neill). As things develop, Captain Courage emerges the hero of the piece by rescuing Scarlet from rival pirate Rubio the Cruel (played by the Bundys' ex-neighbor Steve Rhoades [David Garrison]), so named for his murderous renditions of popular show tunes. Also appearing in Peg's dream are her children Bud (David Faustino) as hunchbacked first mate Fluvio and Kelly (Christina Applegate) as a very confused navigator, not to mention Peg's neighbors Jefferson D'Arcy (Ted McGinley) as Prince Paco and Marcy Darcy (Amanda Bearse) as a cabin...uh...boy. This episode marks the final appearance of child actor Shane Sweet as Seven (and none too soon, according to the series' fans!)(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Rachel's Date. Ross is horrified to learn that Rachel is going on a date with handsome soap-opera actor Kash, especially since she is pregnant with his child. Phoebe is attracted to a cute but clumsy chef and protests when Monica wants to fire him. Elsewhere, Chandler sabotages his quirky colleague Bob's promotion because he's mistakenly been calling Chandler Toby for five years(n)

programme.title: Friends

Chandler (Matthew Perry) is determined to uncover the secrets that lie behind the door of Monica's mysterious -- and securely locked -- bathroom closet. Monica (Courteney Cox) reacts in a disturbingly sensuous manner when Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow) gives her a massage. And some stomach pains lead to a quick trip to the hospital for the pregnant Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) -- and a startling self-discovery for Joey (Matt LeBlanc)(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel
programme.desc: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel. Rachel waits in the hospital maternity ward with an anxious Ross, but to her dismay she is put in a semi-private room. Rachel's "roommates" come and go, and she doesn't think it can get any worse until the heavily pregnant Janice is allocated to share the room with her. While waiting for the birth, Monica and Chandler are inspired to conceive a baby of their own, and Phoebe is attracted to a handsome patient, Cliff. Meanwhile, Ross's mother Judy appears and gives a reluctant Ross his grandmother's engagement ring to propose to Rachel(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Holy Crap. Peter's retired and very religious father drives everyone crazy after he moves in by preaching something no one wants to hear and enforcing his religious views on the workers. When his father fires him from his own job, Peter kidnaps the Pope to convince his father that he's a good son(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Fore, Father. When Lois (voice of Alex Borstein) announces that it's time for "spring cleaning," Peter (voice of Seth MacFarlane) is anxious to get out of it. He ends up taking Chris (voice of Seth Green) on a fishing trip with his neighbors, Joe (voice of Patrick Warburton) and Cleveland (voice of Mike Henry) and their children. Cleveland is also eager to get away as his wife is having a visit from her "Aunt Flo." "Loretta likes to personify her menses in humorous ways," he needlessly explains. On the disastrous trip ("All we caught was a tire, a boot, a tin can, and this book of clichés"), Joe criticizes Peter's parenting skills, and says he's turning Chris into a slacker. Peter responds by getting Chris a job shagging golf balls at a driving range. But Peter is soon distracted from his own son by Cleveland, Jr. (Henry), who can drive a ball 300 yards. Cleveland warns him that the boy has a short attention span, but Peter is determined to turn the boy into a pro, and enters him into the golf club's "Man-Boy Golf Tournament," all the while ignoring his own son. Meanwhile, Stewie (MacFarlane) destroys Brian's (MacFarlane) library. Revenge is served cold when Stewie returns from getting his first vaccination, and Brian soon has him convinced that he's been injected with some kind of mind control serum. This episode features the voice talents of Gary Cole and Nicole Sullivan. The cold opening, a cruel parody of Little House on the Prairie, was edited from FOX's original airing of the episode, but was restored in repeats(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Courtship of Stewie's Father. Stewie has been taking out his aggressions on Lois, and she decides that the reason is because he isn't close enough to his father, so she orders them to bond. They finally succeed at Disney World(n)

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter's Two Dads. Peter stops drinking (but starts smoking crack) after accidentally killing his father while drinking heavily at Meg's birthday party.
